name: Betwixt–The Story of You
description: ◆ APP STORE GAME OF THE DAY Meet Betwixt, the cozy story-based game that helps you master your thoughts and emotions, improve your self-awareness and wellbeing, and ease rumination. Unlike an emotion tracker or a journaling app, Betwixt takes you on a guided immersive adventure deep into the mysteries of your own mind. On this epic inner journey, you’ll reconnect with your wisest self and unlock a whole range of self-awareness powers: • Improve your emotional intelligence, self care and coping skills • Calm your nerves and soothe overwhelming feelings • Uncover new paths to self improvement, self actualization and growth • Tap into your subconscious through the power of story • Identify your values to increase your motivation, sense of gratitude and life purpose • Deepen your self knowledge to help you in overcoming sadness, resentment, low self esteem, fixed mindset, negative perception, insecurities. ◆ WHAT MAKES BETWIXT WORK Betwixt is a relaxing self-reflection game that draws on decades of psychology research and practice into how we feel, think and behave. It includes tools for emotion regulation and self reflection, journal prompts, elements of CBT, mindfulness approaches, Jungian theory and others. Together, these methods work to help you find courage, clarity, and calm. ◆ AN IMMERSIVE EXPERIENCE In Betwixt, you become the hero (or heroine) of an interactive adventure through a dreamlike world that responds to your thoughts and feelings. We’ve used immersive storytelling and sounds to create an alternative for people who find a CBT diary too dry, and struggle to engage with mindfulness, breathing apps, emotion trackers and journaling. Betwixt stands out by offering a creative, engaging approach that removes distractions, improves your focus, motivation and mindset. ◆ EVIDENCE-BASED Independent psychology research shows that Betwixt can significantly reduce emotion dysregulation, with effects that can last months. For years, we’ve been working with researchers to make the science of self-awareness and resilience accessible to anyone. You can find an overview of our research studies and collaborations on our site at https://www.betwixt.life/ ◆ FEATURES • a cozy fantasy story • choose-your-own-path game play • unique immersive experience with soothing soundscapes • 11 dreams that unlock different self-awareness powers • tools for self actualization, improvement, growth, and resilience ◆ EVERYONE DESERVES TO LIVE AN EPIC STORY We believe that emotion regulation resources should be available to all. • No subscriptions, just a simple one-off fee • If you cannot afford to pay, you can request free access through our scholarship program

name: Mental Health Tests
description: FIND OUT IF YOU HAVE A MENTAL HEALTH CONDITION The tests in this app are one of the quickest ways to determine whether you are experiencing symptoms of a specific mental health condition. Mental health conditions, such as depression or anxiety are real, common and treatable. And recovery is possible. Tests include: - Depression Test - Anxiety Test - Adult ADHD Test - PTSD Test - Alcohol/Substance Abuse and Addiction Test - Eating Disorder Test - Gambling Addiction Test - Mania Test - Narcissism Test - Postpartum Depression Test - Sex Addiction Test - Video Game Addiction Test - Internet Addiction Test - Toxic Workplace Test - Panic Disorder Test - Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder Test - Male Sexual Dysfunction Test - Female Aggression Test - Male Aggression Test - Bipolar Disorder Test - Female Sexual Dysfunction Test - Social Anxiety Disorder Test - Hoarding Disorder Test - Psychosis Test - Borderline Personality Disorder Test - Dissociative Identity Disorder Test - Schizophrenia Test We’d love to hear your feedback at team@mind-diagnostics.org FOLLOW US: Web: https://www.mind-diagnostics.org Blog: https://www.mind-diagnostics.org/blog Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/minddiagnostics/?hl=en Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MindDiagnostics/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/MindDiagnostics Download the Mental Health Tests app now and find out if you are suffering from a mental health condition.

name: Talkspace: Virtual Therapy App
description: Talkspace is the most convenient and affordable way to improve your mental health. Get matched with a licensed therapist in your state from the comfort of your device, and message via text, audio, and video. Our subscription service delivers high-quality mental health care to anyone ages 13 and up and has already supported over 1 million people on their mental health journeys. See what they have to say at www.talkspace.com/reviews. HOW DOES TALKSPACE WORK? Tell us your preferences for therapy, and get matched with one of our licensed therapists in your state the same day. Send unlimited text, audio, picture, or video messages from anywhere, at any time — and receive responses at least once a day, 5 days a week. It's a flexible way to support your mental health, no matter your schedule. IS TALKSPACE COVERED BY INSURANCE? Yes! Talkspace partners with leading health plans and employers across the U.S. to make mental health care more affordable and accessible than ever. Simply share your insurance information or employer during checkout to check your eligibility for coverage. IS TALKSPACE EFFECTIVE? Talkspace has been shown to be as effective as face-to-face therapy. In one recent study, 81% of participants felt Talkspace is as effective or better than in-person therapy. In another, individuals who used Talkspace for only 2 months showed significant improvements in symptoms of depression and anxiety—two of the most common mental health conditions. Talkspace has been featured in The Wall Street Journal, CNN.com, Business Insider, and more. For more research data, visit research.talkspace.com. For more of our press coverage, visit talkspace.com/press WHO ARE THE TALKSPACE THERAPISTS? The Talkspace provider network includes thousands of licensed therapists across all 50 states. All therapists are vetted and credentialed according to NCQA standards and bring experience treating a wide range of mental health needs — including depression, anxiety, substance use, stress, relationships, PTSD, and more. IS TALKSPACE SECURE? Your safety and security are our #1 priorities. Our technology is protected using banking-grade encryption and externally audited in compliance with the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA). For more information, find our complete Privacy Policy at talkspace.com/public/privacy-policy. CONNECT WITH US! We’re always happy to connect with users and receive feedback. Email us: support@talkspace.com Check out our website: talkspace.com Follow us on Twitter: twitter.com/Talkspace Follow us on Instagram: instagram.com/talkspace Like us on Facebook: facebook.com/Talkspacetherapy

name: 7 Cups: Online Therapy & Chat
description: Feeling overwhelmed, anxious, or stressed? Struggling with depression, loneliness, or relationship issues? 7 Cups provides a trusted space for mental health support, professional therapy, stress relief and emotional support from experts—right from your phone. Whether you need licensed counseling sessions, peer support, mental health services, talk therapy, advice or mindfulness exercises for anxiety and depression, we’re here to help with evidence-based practices and emotional guidance. Connect with Licensed Therapists & Trained Listeners • 24/7 emotional support through 1-on-1 text, chats and video with trained listener hotlines—for free. • Online therapy and counseling services with licensed professionals for deeper guidance. • Join community, private and closed support groups, mental health forums & chat rooms to share experiences and find encouragement. Mental Health Support for Anxiety, Stress & Depression • Manage anxiety and panic attacks with guided mindfulness and therapeutic breathing exercises. • Reduce stress and boost your mood with over 300 free mental health exercises, self-care activities, and virtual guides. • Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) techniques to help reframe negative thoughts. • Personalized self help tools and mental health care with our free wellness test. Why Choose 7 Cups for Counseling & Therapy? • Confidential & Anonymous: Your identity remains private—even from your therapist or listener. • Flexible & Affordable: Free emotional support sessions and low-cost online therapy options for individuals without insurance. • Recognized & Trusted Treatments: An award-winning mental health app, acknowledged by Stanford MedicineX for innovation in healthcare. • Inclusive & Accepting: We support everyone, regardless of age, gender, sex, or background • Group support: Share your experiences and gain new insights in support groups with licensed therapists. Find Support Anytime, Anywhere Life’s challenges don’t follow a schedule. Whether you’re dealing with work stress, anxiety, depression, trauma, relationship problems, divorce self-esteem issues or you just want to talk to someone, finding a therapist or counselor can be a time-consuming and expensive process. You can’t always talk to friends, family, or coworkers, that’s why 7 Cups provides instant mental health support, remote counseling services, advice, and stress relief—anytime you need it. 100% Confidential Mental Health Help & Chat: Remain 100% anonymous. No one will ever know who you are—not even your listeners, counselor or therapist. 7 Cups’ Listeners Care About You: Our listeners are volunteers. They aren’t getting paid; they’re here because they want to help. We have over 450,000 trained listeners, licensed therapists and social workers to help you. Listeners provide support across 189 countries and in 140 languages. Each listener has a profile with reviews and a list of categories that they specialize in, ranging from panic attacks and bullying to eating disorders, surviving a breakup, and more. When you find the listener you want, connect instantly via chat. Chat with a new listener each time or pick one and develop a deeper ongoing relationship. FAST & FREE: The app is free to download and all listeners are available to chat 100% free. After you download the app, you can start a conversation in less than 60 seconds. Join millions who trust 7 Cups for emotional wellness. Download today and start feeling better! Terms of Service - https://www.7cups.com/Documents/TermsOfService Privacy Policy - https://www.7cups.com/Documents/PrivacyPolicy

name: Ash - AI for Mental Health
description: Ash is an AI built from the ground up for mental health and emotional support. Whether you need support for stress, anxiety, relationships, family problems or a bad day, Ash can help right now with a private, zero judgment space to speak freely. Ash is built for long-term growth, learning from your patterns and building a program to help you reach the goals you want. Each week, get personalized insights to help you understand yourself more deeply and move forward with clarity. How is Ash built? Most AI tools were built using data from the internet. Ash is a specialist AI in human psychology trained on a large-scale data set of proprietary expert data, and is designed and guided by an expert team of the world’s top mental health leaders. Use Ash AI for motivation, accountability, support, reflection, encouragement, pattern-breaking, or a catalyst for change. What outcomes have you seen from people who downloaded Ash? For users who speak to Ash a few times a week or more: - 91% made progress or met goals they set for themselves - On average, users have about one more meaningful real-world relationship *Based on an ongoing research study What does Ash do? Ash gives you a secure space where you can share your unfiltered thoughts without fear of judgement. It remembers what you say, and learns from your interactions to find patterns and generate insights specific to you. It’s available 24/7 over voice & text, so you can use it for a quick check-in or longer deep dive. Who made Ash? Ash is built by a team of therapists, mental health leaders, AI researchers, engineers, and designers. Our work is inspired by our personal stories, lived experience, and loved ones on similar journeys. We believe in a future where quality personalized support is available exactly when people need it. Features of Ash No judgment: Say what you really feel, and get professional guidance. Weekly insights: Ash helps identify themes and patterns of your life. Long-term growth: Ash is designed to help you do the hard work for real change. 24/7, speak or text: Talk to Ash at home, or text Ash in an Uber. Privacy-first design: Speak with the confidence that your chats are secure and anonymous. A fully personalized program: Ash learns from and builds custom support for each person. Get the precise modalities and therapeutic style that you need right now. Testimonials - “As a therapist myself, I’m really impressed by this app!” - “The weekly insights is the best part of this app. Ash spotted patterns of my thoughts in ways I've never considered. And the next steps have given me ways to grow. This is extremely helpful.” - “I cried so hard. It’s so relieving to express myself freely.” - “My strengths are all being pointed out and I really appreciate it. I've been thinking I'm not real great at anything. I really needed this.” - “I'm actually finding support in this app in a way that feels private, useful and keeps my sense of self-respect. I don't go around telling other people about what's going on so it's very nice.” - “Fantastic! We solved a problem I have been dealing with for a week in 5 minutes.” Ash is designed for users 18+. Ash sometimes makes things up. Ash is not a replacement for any medical diagnosis or treatments. Ash cannot, and does not intend to, provide medical advice or diagnosis. Interaction with Ash does not constitute a medical professional–patient relationship. Please do not avoid or delay medical attention as a result of a statement from Ash. Ash is not designed to be used in crisis. If you are in crisis, please seek out professional help, or a crisis line. You can find resources at www.findahelpline.com.

name: Cerebral - Mental Health
description: Cerebral’s national network of licensed and credentialed mental health care doctors and therapists offer one-on-one personalized professional mental health care that will get you feeling better. Working directly with your doctors and therapists can help you overcome your anxiety, depression, insomnia, and more, managing your care all in one place. Cerebral’s app allows you to select your treating doctor and/or therapist, schedule your visits, and have a direct one-on-one telehealth visit with your selected healthcare professional. Here's how it works: · Take a short online assessment to define your symptoms. · Choose a plan that best fits your needs and addresses your symptoms. · Review a panel of doctors and therapists who are licensed and credentialed in your state and available to provide care directly to you · Choose a healthcare professional who best suits your needs · Set up regular synchronous tele mental health care video visits or phone chats with your licensed/credentialed mental health care professional and care team Use the Cerebral app to: · Participate in your one-on-one telehealth visit through video or phone with your licensed/credentialed mental health care professional on your schedule · Contact your care team with questions about scheduling, medications & more · Track medication refills, if clinically indicated and prescribed · Monitor your progress · Access mindfulness, self-care, & CBT (cognitive behavioral therapy) exercises Cerebral’s national network of licensed, credentialed, trained, and experienced mental health care doctors and therapists make direct one-on-one high-quality mental health care accessible and affordable to anyone, anywhere. Our healthcare professionals offer a safe, non-judgmental space for you to be heard and get the professional care you need. To date, our licensed/credentialed tele mental health care professionals have helped over 250,000 patients through their mental health journey. Now it's your turn.

name: MindDoc: Mental Health Support
description: Discover MindDoc: Your Mental Health Companion Embark on your journey towards better mental health with MindDoc. Trusted by over 3 million users worldwide, MindDoc is rated 4.7 stars from 26,000+ reviews, making it the go-to app for mental well-being. DEVELOPED BY EXPERTS IN MENTAL HEALTH Developed by clinical psychologists and researchers, MindDoc is designed to support individuals facing common mental health challenges including depression, anxiety, insomnia, and eating disorders. TRACK YOUR MOOD AND JOURNAL YOUR THOUGHTS Utilize our intuitive mood tracking feature to monitor your emotional state and journal your thoughts, feelings, and experiences. PERSONALIZED INSIGHTS AND FEEDBACK Receive regular feedback on your symptoms, problems, and resources as well as a global assessment of your emotional health that you can download and share with your health care provider. A COMPREHENSIVE COURSE LIBRARY BASED ON COGNITIVE BEHAVIORAL THERAPY (CBT) Receive personalized course recommendations, become an expert in your own mental health, and learn and practice actionable strategies for taking charge of your mental health. UNLOCK PREMIUM FEATURES WITH MINDDOC PLUS Elevate your experience with MindDoc+ and gain unlimited access to our exclusive features with a subscription. Whether you choose a 3-month, 6-month, or 1-year plan, MindDoc+ offers you comprehensive resources and insights to support your mental well-being. YOUR TRUSTED MENTAL HEALTH PARTNER MindDoc serves as your dedicated companion on your mental health journey, offering support for various aspects of well-being, including symptom management, coping with painful emotions, stress management, mindfulness, relationships, time management, and self-image. PRIVACY AND SUPPORT We are committed to your privacy and security. Certified with ISO 27001 and fully GDPR compliant, we prioritize protecting your personal information with the highest standards of security. Our robust data security measures ensure that your information is encrypted and securely stored at all times. Rest assured, your privacy is our priority. For assistance or inquiries, reach out to service@minddoc.com. Learn more about our terms and privacy policy to ensure a safe and secure experience. https://minddoc.com/us/en/terms https://minddoc.com/us/en/self-help/privacy-policy REGULATORY INFORMATION MindDoc app is a risk class I medical product according to Annex VIII, Rule 11 of the MDR (REGULATION (EU) 2017/745 on medical devices). INTENDED MEDICAL PURPOSE The MindDoc app allows users to log signs and symptoms of common mental illnesses in real time over long periods of time. The application enables users to self-manage symptoms and related problems by providing evidence-based transdiagnostic courses and exercises to help identify, understand, and manage symptoms through self-initiated behavior change. The application provides users with regular guidance on whether further medical or psychotherapeutic evaluation is indicated through a general feedback on emotional health. The MindDoc app explicitly does not replace a medical or psychotherapeutic assessment or treatment, but can prepare and support the path to psychiatric or psychotherapeutic treatment. EMPOWERING SELF-MANAGEMENT Empower yourself with tools and resources for self-management and promoting a proactive approach to mental health care. START YOUR MENTAL HEALTH JOURNEY TODAY Take the first step towards taking care of your mental health by downloading MindDoc for free today. Promote your well-being, one step at a time.

name: LiftTalk:Coaching & Counseling
description: Are you feeling anxious, stressed, vulnerable, lonely, heartbroken, or helpless? Whether you're dealing with a breakup, divorce, trust issues, dating challenges, toxic relationships, family conflicts, personal insecurities, or navigating other major life transitions like career changes, relocation, parenthood, health challenges, the loss of a loved one, or simply needing a listening ear, LiftTalk offers a safe 1-on-1 space for guidance and support, helping you find emotional stability, mental clarity, and relationship growth. LiftTalk is here for you every step of the way, guiding you through daily life and its complexities. Trusted by thousands of users and professionals, our platform is the preferred choice for those seeking expert guidance. Our experienced and certified professionals are more than just coaches; they are advocates committed to nurturing your emotional, mental, and relationship wellness. Join a community that genuinely cares, and receive expert advice and continuous support in all areas of life. Let every conversation with LiftTalk be a step towards improved relationship health and emotional well-being. LiftTalk's online coaches are professionals and experienced individuals from diverse backgrounds around the world, consisting of counselors, therapists, life coaches and all kinds of active practitioners. They stand ready to work collaboratively with you, empowering you to overcome challenges and achieve your relationship goals. ===Our app offers=== * Private 1-on-1 conversations: Experience the security and comfort of confidential and anonymous 1-on-1 sessions. Feel free to express your emotions, discuss sensitive topics, and share your concerns. Our advanced encryption also ensures that every message, call, and video is securely protected, offering you a safe space for open dialogue. * Instant coach matching: Need assistance right away? Besides browsing and selecting a coach from the main page, the instant matching feature can swiftly evaluate and pair you with a coach who best aligns with your preferences and needs. * All-in-one connection: Our app delivers the convenience of an all-in-one seamless connection via text, call, or video sessions and engaging in meaningful conversations. Additionally, our robust secure payment system offers you a worry-free checkout experience, ensuring your peace of mind with every transaction. * 24/7 availability: Access guidance and support anytime, anywhere. Regardless of whether you're facing a sudden conflict, dealing with an urgent concern, or simply in need of a listening ear, our LiftTalk coaches are readily available to assist you. * Start a session right away: No need to wait or delay seeking support for your relationship. Our app ensures swift and convenient access to our diverse selection of LiftTalk coaches, providing immediate help at your fingertips. * Flexible scheduling: We strive to accommodate your busy schedule, whether it is an early morning, late evening, or weekend session, we have a coach ready for you. Our goal is to ensure that you can access the support you need at a time that works best for you. * Affordable online sessions: LiftTalk presents a cost-effective alternative to traditional therapy. Recognizing that seeking relationship guidance is a significant investment in your partnership, we offer our online services at affordable rates to ensure you can access the help you need without financial strain. * Discover SafeSpace: We provide an in-app inclusive place where you can post your current life challenges anonymously and let our coaches offer their support for you. You belong to a community that truly understands you. ===What to do next=== Take the proactive step in improving your relationship with LiftTalk, where privacy, flexibility, accessibility, affordability and personalized support are at the forefront of our service. Download LiftTalk now and embark on your journey towards a more fulfilled and happier you.

Please note: Content in the Hers app is for informational purposes only and does not constitute medical advice. Feel more in control Take a few mindful minutes each day to pause and check in with yourself. Honestly helps you release stress and build inner calm—one small step at a time. Understand what’s really going on inside Go through a wellbeing plan with personalised insights about you. Just 5 minutes a day for a lasting change. Unlock personal growth through reflection Based on what you share, Honestly reveals helpful patterns in your mood and behavior—so you can better understand what helps or harms your wellbeing. name: SuperBetter: Mental Health
description: Improve mental health, resilience and social-emotional skills. SuperBetter is at heart a simple and transformative idea – we can use the same strengths naturally displayed in game play to confront real-life challenges, build skills, manage stress & practice self-care. SuperBetter uses the psychology of game play in all of life. Playing SuperBetter means bringing a gameful mindset to real-life - challenging yourself, going for epic wins, adopting a secret identity, completing quests, battling bad guys, activating power-ups and checking-in with allies. The 7 rules for living gamefully is a framework to be stronger, happier, braver & more resilient in everyday life. Invented by researcher & game designer Jane McGonigal, SuperBetter is backed by science. In a randomized controlled trial at University of Pennsylvania playing SuperBetter for 30 days was associated with significant improvements in mental health and resilience. The SuperBetter app makes it simple to go for epic wins, track your gameful strengths and build your whole-person resilience - mental, social, emotional & physical. Proven results in 10 minutes a day. SuperBetter is for youth, teens, young adults & everyone who wants to unlock their heroic potential using the power of living gamefully. Over 1 million people have played SuperBetter. SUPERBETTER PRODUCTS > Hero account: Play SuperBetter on your own. > Host account: A web-based portal to host challenges for squads. > Player account: Join squad challenges when invited by a host. HERO ACCOUNT: PLAY ON YOUR OWN 14-day free trial Grow your mental health, social-emotional wellbeing & physical resilience with a library of over 40 solo challenges. Create your own challenges to go for personal epic wins. Join squad challenges from hosts. Watch a demo video on the SuperBetter website. HOST ACCOUNT: HOST CHALLENGES FOR SQUADS Promote mental health, resilience, social-emotional learning and skills for success with groups in a way that's practical & engaging. Designed for educators, the Host account is available to anyone: > Middle & high school teachers promote social-emotional learning. > Small groups, teams & clubs foster youth mental health & resilience. > Universities empower student success & student wellbeing. > Small businesses make it a low-cost employee wellbeing program. The web-based host portal makes it easy to create squads & host challenges. Squad challenges bring the SuperBetter methodology to life. Each has an epic win and 5-days of activities. Hosts select from a library of over 90 challenges to promote mental, emotional, social & physical resilience, or create custom challenges to have squads go for any epic win they choose. Squad members play about 10 minutes a day on the SuperBetter mobile or web app. They use a free Player account or a low-cost Hero account. Learn more on the SuperBetter website. PLAYER ACCOUNT: SQUAD PLAY ONLY The Player account is a companion to the Host account. It is a free account to play with squads only. Players can join squad challenges when invited by someone with a Host account, and play a weekly challenge hosted by SuperBetter. DESIGNED FOR SMARTPHONES The SuperBetter mobile app is designed for smartphones. If you have a Chromebook, iPad or tablet device you can play on the web app. SUBSCRIPTION TERMS The Hero account price is $24.99 per year. Pricing is for U.S. customers. Pricing in other countries may vary. Charges may be converted to local currency depending on country of residence. Payment will be charged to the credit card connected to your iTunes Account when you confirm the initial subscription purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled before the end of the current subscription period. Manage your subscription in Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription.

name: Circles - Mental Health Groups
description: Circles is a safe space for those navigating narcissistic relationships. Find support in live, audio-only group sessions led by professionals and a community that understands. Share your experiences, listen to others, and connect with people who have been through similar challenges. Circles is designed for those recovering from emotional abuse, whether from a partner, family member, or friend. Support is available anytime, offering a path to healing through shared experiences and expert guidance. WHY PEOPLE LOVE CIRCLES: ***** "This app helped me more in 6 months than thousands of dollars and years of therapy.” ***** "I felt alone because no one could understand. Until now. This app has saved my life.” ***** "Circles have given me strength to continue my journey to happiness.” WHO IS IT FOR? * Anyone dealing with or recovering from narcissistic relationships. * People looking for a safe and understanding support system. * Those who feel isolated and want to connect with others who truly understand. * Anyone seeking expert guidance to heal from emotional abuse. * People who prefer a flexible, anonymous space to share and listen at their own pace. KEY FEATURES: + Live Group Support: Join expert-led sessions throughout the day, offering real-time guidance and a place to be heard. + Peer Connection: Engage with others who share similar experiences, fostering understanding and support. + Guided Healing: Learn practical tools to manage emotions, set boundaries, and regain confidence. + Flexible Access: Drop into sessions whenever needed, integrating support into daily life. + Anonymity and Privacy: Speak freely in a judgment-free, audio-only environment. HOW IT WORKS 1. Sign Up - Choose what life challenge you're going through. 2. Explore Plans - Receive tailored recommendations. 3. Join Live Groups- Connect with people who understand, stay anonymous if you choose. 4. Follow Guides - Stay updated on expert-led sessions. 5. Connect with Peers - Find support from others on a similar path.

name: Soluna: Mental Health Care
description: Soluna is a confidential, mental health app designed to help young people navigate life’s challenges. With interactive tools, community features, and access to professional support, Soluna is a space to check in with yourself daily and improve your mental wellness at your own pace. Their words, not ours: “Soluna has provided me a safe, pressure-free space to feel heard, valued, and proactive about my mental wellbeing.” “I feel less alone knowing I have a space to talk about what I’m struggling with. Sometimes all I need is to know someone cares.” WHO IS THIS FOR? Soluna is available for young people in California and New Jersey thanks to partnerships with your state. Eligibility for services vary by state. • California (ages 13-25): Coaching & Care Navigation • New Jersey (ages 13-18): Coaching & Counseling WHAT DOES SOLUNA OFFER? In the Soluna universe, some of our most popular tools include: • Mood Log: Record and explore your emotional patterns • Goals: Set and track meaningful goals to map your future • Free Write: Destress and process feelings in your digital journal • Starboard: Draw peacefully when you can’t find the words • Breathwork: Steady yourself with easy-to-follow animations Download the app to access the entire Solunaverse, including quizzes, videos, articles, and more! 1:1 PROFESSIONAL SUPPORT & ACCESS TO LOCAL RESOURCES • Gain instant access to a team of mental health professionals • Schedule a chat with a mental health professional or drop in when you need it — you choose • Explore your goals, problems, feelings, and ideas to live your best life • Learn about mental health services and other resources local to your area Check us out on social! Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/soluna.app/ TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@soluna.app Soluna is not a replacement for therapy or professional medical advice. You should always seek a doctor's advice before making any medical decisions.

name: Meru Health
description: Meru Health is mental health care with continuous support from a licensed therapist, via both video calls and unlimited in-app chat. Mental health doesn’t wait for the calendar—neither should your mental health care. Download today to book a call with a therapist and see for yourself. Continuous care When you begin the Meru Health program, your licensed Meru Health therapist is available via both scheduled face-to-face video sessions and unlimited, asynchronous chat. It’s support built around your life, not someone else’s schedule. Coaching option The continuous-care model applies to both Meru Health’s 12-week therapy program and our 8-week coaching option (see below), which is supported by certified behavioral health coaches. No one wouldn’t like to feel better. For some, Meru Health coaching is the best way to achieve that. Connecting the mind and the body Mental health isn’t just mental. Nutrition, sleep, exercise, and even simple breath directly impact your mental health. With Meru Health’s wearable heart-rate variability device, you can see this connection in action. The Meru Health App The Meru Health app enhances your care experience with guided, evidence-based lessons and activities that you can do on your own or with support of your therapist or coach. In-network Insurance Coverage Meru Health is covered by several health insurance providers and is a free employee benefit with some employers. Cost depends on individual plans, copays, and deductibles. But even the 12-week program is far cheaper than the average cost of 12 weeks of traditional therapy. Our team will connect with your health plan to determine your cost share, if any. Proven Outcomes After program completion, 73% of Meru participants show clinically significant improvement, and 59% are in remission from symptoms of depression or anxiety. This exceeds the 12-week outcomes of traditional approaches to mental health care. The 12-Week Treatment Program 1. Up to four face-to-face therapy sessions, via video call, plus unlimited support via in-app chat—all with a licensed therapist who will be with you for the duration of the program. 2. Guided in-app lessons and activities to help you recognize your emotions, move past negative thoughts, improve relationships, and the role of sleep and nutrition in mental health. 3. A wearable device that, along with guided breathing practices, will help you see and improve your body’s physical response to stress. The mind and the body talk to each other. Meru Health’s heart rate variability (HRV) tools help you listen in. 4. Anonymous support and connection from a community of fellow Meru Health participants. The 8-Week Coaching Program 1. Two face-to-face video sessions with your certified coach, plus unlimited support via in-app chat. 2. Guided in-app activities and lessons to help you develop skills for reducing stress, increasing resilience, and unlocking your best self. 3. Weekly workshops to dive deeper into skills and practices and help lock in the changes you seek.

name: MindHealth: Mental Health CBT
description: Our Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) App — is your personal psychotherapist in a mobile format, designed for everyone aiming to improve their mental health and psychological well-being. Psychological Tests Currently, diagnostic tests are available for various psychological issues such as depression, eating disorders, neurosis, and ADHD. After completing these tests, you can create your own psychological profile and monitor its progress over time. Our psychological tests are developed considering modern methods in psychiatry and psychotherapy. After taking the tests for depression and anxiety, you will receive feedback and recommendations from qualified psychotherapists. These tests are your first step towards anti-depression and enhancing your mental health. Popular CBT Techniques - CBT Thoughts Diary (cbt journal) — a primary tool of cognitive behavioral therapy. The diary consists of 9 steps, helping you identify and work through your cognitive distortions. - Daily Diary — record your thoughts freely with analysis and recommendations from AI. - Coping Cards — note down your destructive beliefs in coping cards format and work through them conveniently. Studying Psychology We have developed a series of interactive courses on topics such as depression and mental health. Thanks to our educational materials, you will understand the basic principles of CBT and learn how to work properly with a thoughts diary. Throughout your journey, your personal AI psychologist will accompany you. It will suggest the best exercises based on your condition and help rephrase negative thoughts. Mood Tracker Twice a day, you can assess your mood and note predominant emotions. This way, you can track changes in your well-being and maintain a mood diary. Depression, neurosis, anxiety, burnout, panic attacks — unfortunately, these issues are familiar to everyone. That is why we started developing our product. Our goal is to create the best self-help app on the market. We position the app as "your personal psychologist" for self-help. Our AI assistant will support you on the challenging path to psychological health. In addition, you will find affirmations and reflective questions in the app. You can share your experiences with others. Our methods are based on proven principles of cognitive behavioral therapy, one of the most effective psychotherapy methods. With our app, everyone can become their own psychotherapist, gain self-confidence, improve mental and psychological health, and overcome anxiety disorders and depression. Use of this app is subject to Apple's standard license agreement, available at https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/.

name: Smiling Mind: Mental Wellbeing
description: Smiling Mind gives you a head-start to managing the ups and downs of everyday life. Welcome to your versatile and practical mental fitness toolkit. The Smiling Mind App helps you learn the skills that underpin wellbeing and create the habits to thrive. Develop your own, unique approach to building your mental fitness, navigating challenges and meeting your goals. It’s your daily workout for life, in your pocket. Our app is underpinned by the Smiling Mind Mental Fitness Model, designed by psychologists and mental health experts to help you develop the foundation for your mind to thrive. Smiling Mind supports you to practise mental fitness through five core skill sets, empowering you to: live mindfully, embrace flexible thinking, grow connections, act purposefully and recharge your body. The Smiling Mind App provides you with personalised content, tools and resources to support your specific wellbeing needs and goals. There’s a range of content for minds of all ages and stages, with children’s collections suitable for ages 5 to 12, and adult collections that take you from beginner practice to everyday habits! The Smiling Mind App has: * 700+ lessons, practices and meditations * 50+ curated collections With a range of special features, the app helps you build mental fitness and resilience; support good sleep, study and sports training; reduce stress; improve relationships; and promote the development of new social and emotional skills. As SonderMind expands to new states, more insurance plans will be coming. We also offer affordable self-pay rates if you aren't using insurance. SonderMind providers are not currently in-network with Medicaid or Tricare. How do I find a SonderMind therapist? After answering a few questions, online or over the phone, we use proven insights to find the best clinical match for your needs. We'll also take into account any preferences or criteria you request, like gender or cultural similarities. We do the work of finding the ideal provider for you.

name: Flow - Depression treatment
description: Flow represents a new chapter in the understanding and treatment of depression, based on the latest psychology and neuroscience research. The app can be used on its own and offers an education programme with over 50 sessions. The sessions cover a range of topics from behavioural coaching and lifestyle habits, such as, meditation, sleep, diet and exercise. To track changes over time, the app includes the MADRS-s depression test. Used as a companion tool for the Flow brain stimulation headset, this is a holistic approach to treating depression. The type of stimulation used in the Flow headset, transcranial direct current stimulation (tDCS), has long been used in clinical settings to treat depression. With Flow, you can now access tDCS in a remote device from your own home. To use the headset you will need the app. The Flow treatment is based on decades of clinical research and is supported by more than 20 randomised double-blind studies. The Flow headset is approved as a medical device (CE) in the EU and UK for the treatment of depression. Order it at: https://flowneuroscience.com The programme contains over 50 education sessions split into 7 courses, covering topics such as: - Exercise Physical exercise has been shown to have a similar effect to antidepressant medication when it comes to reducing and preventing depressive symptoms. Flow education explores the types of exercise that are beneficial. - Meditation Meditation is practised by many people around the world as mental “exercise” for the brain. Flow will give you exercises to follow but also show you the neurological basis of why meditation is good for managing stress in your everyday life. - Sleep Did you know that sleeping for only six hours each night for two nights in a row is equivalent to being continuously awake for 24 hours? Flow will educate you on sleep hygiene, why we sleep and why sleeping is one of four important pillars for overcoming depression. - Nutrition The nutrition sessions will advise and encourage you to eat in a way that science has proven reduces inflammation in the brain, thereby alleviating depression. Spoiler alert: sugar is one of the big villains.

You should not take any action or avoid taking any action without consulting with a qualified mental health professional.

name: UrSpace
developer: Mental Health Association For Chinese Communities
description: UrSpace provides easy access to comprehensive mental health support and services, available at your fingertips. Designed with personalized care in mind, UrSpace offers tools for tracking your mental health and finding relaxation. Key Features: AI Chatbot: Engage with an AI-powered chatbot that offers emotional support and listens to your concerns. Self-help CBT: Practice Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) techniques guided by our AI to manage anxiety and depression. Psychological Testing: Take quizzes to assess and understand your mental well-being. Breathing and Meditation Exercises: Customize your exercises with our new voiceover-guided meditation sessions for optimal relaxation and stress relief. Mood Tracking Calendar: Track and visualize your mood over time with our enhanced calendar. Diary and Planning: Keep a daily diary, plan your activities, and browse and join local and online events to stay connected. Resources and Stories: Access a library of resources, stories, and videos for mental health education, plus a directory of psychiatrists and therapists.

name: Hiwell Therapy & Mental Health
description: Hiwell is a secure software chosen by more than 1 million users. By finding the right clinical psychologist and dietitian for you, you can start feeling better both mentally and physically today! With Hiwell, used by more than 2,000 expert clinical psychologists and psychiatrists, you can access online psychological support and psychiatry services based on scientific approaches for anxiety, stress, unhappiness, relationship and work problems, and other well-being needs. You can also get support from professional dietitians to reach your nutrition goals. Hiwell psychologists are therapists trained and specialized in Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT), Dynamic Therapy, Interpersonal Therapy, Schema Therapy, and other psychotherapy methods. Hiwell psychiatrists are medical doctors who have completed specialization in psychiatry. All psychologist, psychiatrist, and dietitian sessions are conducted with 100% confidentiality and security. None of the sessions can be viewed or recorded by third parties. All payments are processed through encrypted pages. What Does Hiwell Offer? Online Psychologist Online psychologists using Hiwell’s infrastructure are recognized in Türkiye and have passed thorough evaluations and interviews. After selecting the psychologist that suits you best, you can have a free 15-minute video call to test your compatibility and ask questions about the support process. Online Psychiatrist With Hiwell’s expert psychiatrists, you can consult online, undergo an evaluation, and confidently start a treatment process tailored to your needs. With flexible appointment options, you can easily access professional support anytime, anywhere, and consult with your doctor. E-Prescription* E-Report* *It applies in cases your doctor deems necessary. Online Dietitian – New Now you can also receive online nutrition counseling from expert dietitians on Hiwell. With personalized nutrition plans, flexible appointment hours, and ongoing follow-up support, you can take steps toward a sustainable lifestyle. You can also have a free 15-minute video call with your dietitian to test compatibility and ask questions. Why Hiwell? Hiwell’s advanced algorithm, based on your registration answers, matches you with the most suitable therapists and psychiatrists according to your expectations, needs, and schedule, and dietitians according to your nutrition goals. With the mission of making psychological support, psychiatry, and dietitian consultations accessible to everyone, Hiwell leverages technology to provide professional online services worldwide at affordable prices. Through Hiwell’s free psychological tests, you can gain awareness about anxiety, low mood, social anxiety, phobias, alcohol use, traumatic grief, post-traumatic stress, self-esteem, attention difficulties, and more. You can then discuss these issues with your psychologist during therapy sessions or with your psychiatrist during consultations. You also get free access to a rich content library written by expert psychologists, psychiatrists, and dietitians. With psychologists on Hiwell’s platform, you can safely access adult therapy, couples therapy, and child & adolescent therapy, and with psychiatrist doctors, you can access psychiatric consultations. From dietitians, you can get support for healthy weight management, PCOS, thyroid, insulin resistance, diabetes, sports nutrition, pregnancy and breastfeeding nutrition, vegan/vegetarian diets, child & adolescent nutrition, and personalized meal plans. Contact Us You can reach us via the Client Support Line or by emailing hello@hiwellapp.com for questions, feedback, or to apply as a psychologist / psychiatrist doctor / dietitian.

name: Estenarh - استنارة
description: The Estenarh app, approved by the Ministry of Health, offers the best online therapy and counseling from licensed therapists and psychologists for medical, psychological, social, and family support. Accessible and private, Estenarh is a therapy app for diverse needs, from individual therapy needs and online therapy for teens to online couples therapy and online therapy sessions for families. Estenarh specializes in various mental health areas including stress, anxiety, depression, teen issues, marriage counseling, divorce, post-separation crises, obsessive-compulsive disorder, sleep disturbance, mood disorders, and more. Estenarh App Features: Complete privacy: Secure encryption ensures confidentiality in all online therapy communications. Experienced Online Therapists: Professional online psychologists and counselors with extensive expertise. Affordable therapy options: Flexible payment methods for all. Multiple communication options: Choose text, phone, or video for your online counseling sessions. Instant Booking: Start therapy online in less than 5 minutes. Reliable Reviews: Verified authentic reviews from real Estenarh users. Easy Booking: Flexible appointment scheduling and booking available all day. Let us help you take steps toward a happier and healthier life with support that’s always at your fingertips through the Estenarh mental health app.

name: Mindbloom
description: Meds, talk therapy, or self-care not quite getting you there? Achieve your breakthrough with clinician-prescribed, guided psychedelic experiences to help combat anxiety or depression. Our science-backed programs are designed by leading psychiatrists and facilitated by caring, expert guides. Ready to join thousands of others who’ve improved their lives with Mindbloom? Go to mindbloom.com to take our brief assessment and begin your healing journey today! INCLUDED IN OUR INITIAL PROGRAM, THE BASICS - 6 At-home Ketamine Treatments - 1 Bloombox (Premium At-home Care Kit) - 2 Psychiatric Clinician Consults - 3 Guide Sessions (1 Prep / 2 Integration) - Unlimited Group Integration Sessions - Unlimited Messaging HOW MINDBLOOM WORKS - Take our brief assessment to see if you’re a fit - Book your video consult with a Mindbloom clinician - Meet with your Mindbloom Guide to set your intentions - Relax and enjoy your healing journey in the comfort of your home - Meet with your Mindbloom guide to integrate your experience - Continue building on your progress IS MINDBLOOM EFFECTIVE? Yes! Over 90% of clients report improvement in depressive symptoms and over 92% of clients report improvement in anxiety symptoms after two sessions.* *Clients with moderate to severe depression or anxiety who report improvement in symptoms after two sessions (1+ points on PHQ-9) See important safety information at: https://www.mindbloom.com/safety-information CONNECT WITH US! We’re always happy to connect and receive feedback. Email us: support@mindbloom.com Check out our website: mindbloom.com Follow us on Twitter: twitter.com/mymindbloom Follow us on Instagram: instagram.com/mymindbloom Like us on Facebook: facebook.com/mymindbloom/
