description: 壹点灵致力于让每一位用户，无论身处何地，都能便捷地获得高品质、专业可信赖的心理咨询服务。 服务覆盖全球174个国家和地区，支持中英法日韩德等50+种语言沟通，打造全球多元化的一站式心理健康服务平台。 我们提供一个安全、私密、稳定的心理支持空间，让您可以随时倾诉困扰，得到你想要的专业帮助。 •拥有超60,000名平台严选、经验丰富、专业受训的持证心理咨询师，其中硕博学历占比超过70%。 •服务覆盖抑郁、焦虑、情绪压力、情感关系、亲子教育、婚姻家庭、职场发展、人际沟通等多个心理健康领域 •基于您的需求、偏好与地域，智能匹配合适的咨询师，确保服务契合度 •截至目前，壹点灵已为超过 5,000万用户提供心理咨询服务，帮助他们走出困境，迈向内在成长 在壹点灵，您会发现，获得专业的心理支持，是一种值得信赖的日常选择。 在这里你可以： 【专业心理咨询】一键预约专家，一对一私人专属咨询。涵盖情绪压力、恋爱婚姻情感、人际关系、亲子教育、职场压力、个人成长等各类问题； 【即时倾诉】1对1，7*24小时，无需等待，随时与您信赖的心理咨询师通过文字、语音和视频发送消息； 【心理课程】心理健康教育专家团队量身打造的系列课程，无论您是心理学专业学生、心理学爱好者、新手心理咨询师、资深心理咨询从业者还是想要走出不同人生阶段的困扰，都能通过公开课、直播课、文章、问答等形式，学习心理学知识，获得全面专业的心理咨询资源和支持，帮您在心理咨询领域从0到1快速成长。 【心理测试】爱情测试、性格测试、情商测试等各类专业测试，帮您探索未知的自己； 【互动心声话题社区】通过『心事信箱』、『心球说说』、『问答社区』等，您可以在这里记录心情、分享感悟，与社区成员和咨询师共同交流。关于人际关系、情感困扰、心理健康等方面的问题，您可以在这里提问讨论，一个问题多个老师多个角度进行分析，集思广益。我们鼓励您积极参与互动，相互支持，共同成长。 产品功能： 1、心理咨询 2、倾诉热线 3、心理课程 4、心理测评 5、树洞社群 6、心声问答 7、文字倾诉 8、AI暖暖互动 9、心理文章、视频、在线直播公开课、大师课 10、咨询师督导 …… 选择我们： 【专业靠谱，团队强大】知名心理专家牵头，专业团队审核、活体认证、上岗培训，全方位把关，提高专业服务水平； 【内容丰富，知你所需】心理测试、动态社区、互动聊天......更多精彩等您发现； 【公益服务，回馈社会】平台专家除了在线提供解答服务外，还长期热衷公益，回馈社会，壹点灵公益服务时长超过200万小时； 【隐私安全，权益保障】您的安全和保障是我们的第一要务，一对一私人专属咨询，我们的技术支持文字、语音、视频的银行级加密保护，充分保障您的权益。 -------------------------- 联系我们！ 我们总是乐于与用户联系并收到反馈。 查看我们的网站：https://www.ydl.com/ 免责声明：本应用所包含或可通过本应用访问的信息和资料仅供参考，不应解释为医疗建议，也不应用于诊断或治疗目的。如果您觉得自己有健康问题，请咨询专业医务人员。

name: Dario Mind (Twill)
description: Conquer negative thoughts, overcome worries, and reduce stress using science-based activities and games. Created by scientists, researchers, and doctors, Dario Mind (formerly Twill Therapeutics) contains products that can help you learn and apply proven techniques and life-changing skills to create healthier everyday habits. Start your journey with a goal-oriented track that can help you: - Manage negative thinking - Overcome stress and burnout - Feel more connected to others - Cope with your worries Discover activities, meditations, and games that can help strengthen your mental health. Practice a skill, try a new technique, and track your progress. With Dario Mind, you can take care anywhere. Download Dario Mind and you’ll be able to: - Unlock personalized insights - Build skills and turn them into everyday habits - Track your progress and see how you improve over time as you continue along your journey - Get daily inspiration and well-being tips - Access products with tracks featuring evidence-based activities, games, meditations, and more

name: Confidant Health
description: Confidant Health is your all-in-one mental health companion. We make it easy to connect with trusted professionals and tools so you can focus on feeling better—on your schedule. Key Features: - Access licensed professionals: Meet with experienced therapists, coaches, and psychiatric providers virtually, from the comfort of home. - Convenient scheduling: Book sessions quickly and easily, with availability 7 days a week. - Complete support: Therapy, coaching, and medication management—all in one secure platform. - Personalized care plans: Get recommendations and ongoing support tailored to your goals and needs. - Private and secure: Your information is fully protected with HIPAA-compliant technology. Why Confidant Health? - Most members are able to have an appointment with a provider in less than 72hrs. - 87%+ of members report meaningful improvements in their well-being. - We take care of the details, from scheduling to insurance verification, so you can focus on you. Get Started Today: Download Confidant Health and take the first step toward feeling better. We’re here to support your mental health and well-being—wherever you are.

name: Onward by NeuroFlow
description: This app requires an invitation. Please check with your healthcare provider, insurance plan or employer to see if they offer Onward by NeuroFlow. This app is not compatible with iPads. Please use our website on your tablet’s browser at www.neuroflowlive.com Onward by NeuroFlow is a digital health app for tracking, assessing, and managing your mental wellness. We provide a fun and easy-to-use tool that guides and supports your journey towards improved, more holistic wellbeing. To learn more, visit www.neuroflow.com. Use Onward to: Complete evidence-based mindfulness, relaxation, and self-care activities Earn rewards for working on your mental wellness Log and track your mood and sleep Write journals and reflections Take health assessments that give you feedback on your progress over time Contact crisis resources easily Onward integrates with the Health App to help you track your steps and set goals. You can turn this on after logging in, by visiting the Home tab. If you need help signing up, please reach out via support@neuroflow.com. - "This is a great app...it also has great suggestions and meditation exercises to help lift your state of mind." - "I love the fact that I can get rewards for engaging in my behavioral health" - "I can see the benefits already!!! Thank you!" - "I love it! I use it everyday several times a day" - "This is a wonderful way to stay in touch with my doctor on a regular basis" - "I am really so excited about NeuroFlow. it makes me stop and take care of my wellbeing for short periods of time during the day."

name: 5 Minute Journal・Daily Diary
description: The Five Minute Journal uses proven principles of positive psychology to make you happier in 5 minutes a day with the guided gratitude journaling format “There are plenty of benefits to journaling, whether you take time to write out your full thoughts or just spend a few minutes jotting down the things you're most grateful for every day or lessons you've learned. Five Minute Journal for the iPhone makes this process easy enough to do on the go.” — Lifehacker BENEFITS OF PRACTICING GRATITUDE Cultivating gratitude can positively impact all areas of your life—from personal growth and emotional intelligence to meaningful relationships and enhanced productivity. A lot of thought leaders practice gratitude (including Oprah Winfrey, Richard Branson, Tim Ferris, and many others), as studies have found it improves health, has lasting positive effects on the brain, and is a key to mental wellbeing. Practicing gratitude with the Five Minute Journal app brings you a more positive outlook on life and ability to notice wonderful things and capture the life-changing experiences. The key is consistency. With its thoughtful features and a structure to help you focus on what’s good, you will find The Five Minute Journal app to be a great way to start and end your day. WHAT OUR COMMUNITY IS SAYING “Not only do I love the simplicity in the design, but the fact that it takes only a minute to update the entries means this is something I’ll actually use. This app really gets you thinking about the positive things right before you start your day.” FIVE MINUTE JOURNAL APP FEATURES – Beautiful, Intuitive Journaling Experience: The Five Minute Journal app has been designed to capture the physical Five Minute Journal experience. Getting around the app is a breeze and adding entries is easy with a guided flow for both your morning and evening entries. – Easy Journal Entry Navigation: Quickly cycle through previous entries by scrolling your timeline or by tapping on a specific date in calendar view. – Guided Journaling Flow & Prompts: A new guided process to help you get the most from your gratitude journal experience. – Reminders: Set daily notifications to keep up with a rewarding journaling habit. – Timeline View: Access previous journal entries and view short daily excerpts. Tapping an entry leads to a full day review. – Daily Quotes & Weekly Challenges: Receive daily inspiring quotes and weekly challenges, and share them across social media. – Passcode Protection: Keep all your journal entries private with secure passcode, Face ID or Touch ID protection. – Dark Mode: Use your journal in either light or dark mode, which is especially great for late night journaling. – Compatible With Any Device or platform: Use it on iPhone app, iPad app and Apple Watch companion app. – Track your mindful minutes in the Apple Health app with our HealthKit integration – Streaks: Track your personal progress and get insights on positive changes in your life. – Backup/Export: Easily backup your entries and export your treasured memories and media to PDF, HTML, Dropbox, and more. You can select a date range or export all. PREMIUM FEATURES Five Minute Journal App offers an optional monthly or yearly subscriptions with free trials or lifetime license. Here's what you get when you unlock the Premium: – Photos and Video: Capture and view your magical moments with a daily photo or video. Attach media to any of your daily prompts. – Personalized Practice: Create your own custom questions, tailored to your mood and goals. – Space for Notes: Clear your thoughts and write freely in the new notes section. – Mood tracker: Check in with yourself, express how you feel, and gain insights into how your emotions influence your days. – Look Back Reminders: Get reminded of your memories with the “On this Day” feature. – Timeline Photo View: See a photographic timeline view of all your daily photos. – Widget: Add a thoughtful Five Minute Journal widget to your home screen.

name: Spring Health Mobile
description: Spring Health provides personalized mental healthcare and wellness support designed to help you feel your best. Download the app to unlock your benefit (at no cost to you). Browse our diverse provider network and schedule therapy or other care appointments from anywhere. No matter what you’re going through, you’ll find therapists who can relate. Explore our library of self-guided exercises, called Moments, and build skills to manage stress, anxiety, sadness, or whatever you’re experiencing in life right now. Depending on your benefit’s coverage, Spring Health can also be available for your family. Get mental health support for your loved ones right from the app. About Spring Health Finding the right mental health resources can be daunting and confusing — that’s why we’re here. Spring Health’s whole mission is to get more people better support for managing stress, anxiety, depression, or anything else they experience. Our data-based approach reduces the trial-and-error period of your treatment, so the support you get is actually supportive. Download the Spring Health app to: Schedule appointments (get access to a provider in as little as 2 days) Access Moments, our library of wellness exercises on subjects like meditation, sleep, and more Search our diverse network of licensed clinicians (our providers have an average 9.4/10 rating among our members) Receive personalized care recommendations Message your dedicated Care Navigator at any time Get 24/7 support Getting started is simple: Sign up to create your free account Take a quick assessment: Answer a handful of questions so that we can tailor your care to you. Our clinically-validated wellness assessment personalizes your care, addressing your immediate needs and long-term goals. Get a personalized care plan: Once you complete your assessment, you’ll get a care plan that is made for your immediate needs. We’ll also match you with a Care Navigator (a licensed clinician), who can help set up appointments, answer your questions, and guide your care. Explore your care: Book a session, or just explore the app. If you’re hesitant about taking the first step or have any questions, check in with your dedicated Care Navigator – that’s what they are there for. If you’re feeling like some quick support right away, try Moments, our collection of guided exercises. Does Spring Health keep my participation confidential? Absolutely – your privacy is our priority. We only use your answers and information to create a personalized treatment to help you get better, faster. How much does Spring Health cost? Spring Health is no additional cost to you. Depending on your benefit, your dependents may also have access to the benefit at no additional cost. Costs for therapy and medication management may be subject to costs associated with your health plan.

name: Cingulo: Healing and Growth
description: Tackle your emotional issues and grow self-awareness all by yourself. Based on over 15 years of scientific research and clinical knowledge about the human mind, the app uses state-of-the-art approaches from modern psychology and personal development methods. Cingulo has been recognized as an innovative and accessible tool for personal growth and mental wellness, with thousands of users reporting rapid and significant changes in their lives. You can use it independently or as a complement to psychotherapy or coaching. You can take your first mental fitness test for free. Paid features include: - Unlimited Mental Fitness Tests: periodic and science-based test to assess your emotions, traits and behaviors and track their progress. - Self-discovery Sessions: a wide and rich content with hundreds of techniques to help manage anxiety, stress, self-esteem, insecurity, depression, focus, attitude, relationships, and more, including guided meditation sessions. - SOS: effective techniques for quickly resolving acute moments of distress, with practices that also assist with insomnia problems. - Journal: a space to record daily highs and lows and reflect on the lessons learned. -------------- Terms of Use: https://accounts.cingulo.com/terms.html

name: Day One: Daily Journal & Diary
description: Apple’s App of the Year with over 15 million downloads and 200,000 5-star ratings globally, Day One has reinvented journaling, letting you record your life as you live it. Securely save audio, video, photos, notes, and more wherever you are, whenever you want. “Day One creates something so rare it feels almost sacred: A completely private digital space.” – New York Times “Day One makes keeping a journal delightfully easy.” – Wired WHY DAY ONE? Day One is the original digital journal app. A decade of updates and feature additions make it the most private, trusted, and easiest-to-use journaling app in the world. SIMPLE TO USE, EASY TO LOVE • Beautiful, award-winning design • Unlimited text entries • Powerful rich text formatting with markdown • Different journals for every aspect of your life* PRIVATE AND SECURE • Automatic backups keep your journal entries safe • End-to-end encryption, which is a fancy way of saying your entries are 100% private • Journal entries stay secure with passcode, TouchID, or FaceID • Export options (pdf, plain text, etc.) ensure your entries always stay yours FORM A HABIT & STAY CONSISTENT • Streaks and calendar view help keep your momentum going • Programmable reminders through text message or phone notifications • Unique, daily journal prompts help eliminate writer’s cramp • Customizable templates save time and add organization to entries • Today view provides a summary of where you’ve been and what you’ve done • Integrates with the Health app to track mindfulness minutes MORE THAN WORDS • Unlimited photos and video* • Auto-importer for your Instagram posts* • Handwritten entries or drawings* • Voice recording and transcription* JOURNAL FROM WHEREVER, WHENEVER • Cross-platform apps available on iPhone, Apple Watch, iPad, and Mac • The ability to text or email entries straight to your journal BUILT FOR REMINISCING • On This Day feature allows you to revisit past memories • Tags, favorites, and search filters make it easy to find what you’re looking for • Map view quickly shows all the places you’ve journaled from • Print capabilities turn your digital journal into a premium physical book TYPE LESS, PRESERVE MORE • Time, date, weather, moon phase, and more are automatically added to every entry • IFTTT applets allow importing data from Spotify, YouTube, Strava, Fitbit, Facebook, Twitter, and more • Siri Shortcuts provides a powerful way to automate more of your journaling • Share sheet allows you to add content from other apps, like Apple Photos and Safari *Day One is FREE to use forever with unlimited entries. Additional features, including unlimited photos, videos, and audio recordings are available with a Day One Premium membership. Start a free trial today. Privacy Policy: https://dayoneapp.com/privacy-policy/ Terms of Use: https://dayoneapp.com/terms-of-use/ For technical assistance or other inquiries: https://dayoneapp.com/contact/

name: Ooca ปรึกษาปัญหาใจ
description: Wanna talk to a psychologist but you don't have any free time to go to the hospital? OOCA, are here, the alternative choice for the tele mental health service in your phone! OOCA is easy to use, convenient and confidential. A whole package in one app! Just download us, login, choose your personal psychiatrist or psychologist and date/time you prefer, make a payment, then BRAVO, your appointment awaits! OOCA is a mental health service platform for the individuals and organizations. Our psychiatrists and psychologists are qualified for you and those who you care about. We believe that every problem disturbing you can be prevented and fixed. OOCA volunteers to be a part of your journey to conquer it all. Because you are important. What matters to you, it’s okay, we’ll listen. Relationship issues, love, work-life balance, self-improvement, feeling depressed, burnout at work or school, you can try to make it better by starting a conservation with our qualified psychiatrists or psychologists just a few clicks away! Why OOCA? Our mental health professionals have an array of expertise, including: - Licensed psychiatrists. (Verified by The Medical Council of Thailand.) - Licensed clinical psychologists. (Verified by Thai Clinical Psychologist Association.) - Counseling psychologist with a master’s degree or higher in counseling psychology. ***OOCA has more than 100 mental health professionals, the highest number in Thailand for the digital mental wellness platform. Our past clients OOCA offers services to individuals of more than 120,000 users and businesses as a mental wellness solution for employees. We are currently taking care of more than 76,000 employees of prestigious Thai corporates and companies such as Bank of Thailand, Chevron, SCG Chemicals, Kasikorn Bank and more of leading organizations in Thailand. Who is OOCA? OOCA is a tele mental health application from Thailand, providing counseling services via video calls with mental health professionals for individuals and corporate clients. Here at OOCA, everything will remain confidential and secured. Our goal is to make mental health topic general in our society. We are leading progression in the health-tech start-up scene and aim to embrace technology to recreate mental-health wellness/awareness globally and look forward to bring in foreign professionals on our platform in order to provide ex-pat services and also regional expansion. ----------------- OOCA. It's Okay. Let's talk. -----------------

name: Rozmova: mental health app
description: - Знайдіть свого ідеального фахівця за допомогою нашого індивідуального алгоритму - Щоб обрати спеціалістів, які допоможуть вам досягти ваших цілей, ми пропонуємо вам заповнити коротку анкету. У ній ви можете описати свої очікування від терапевта. На основі ваших відповідей ми запропонуємо список фахівців, які найкраще вам підходять. Ми враховуємо кожен аспект вашої анкети при виборі професіоналів, які допоможуть досягти ваших терапевтичних цілей. - Тільки перевірені та сертифіковані терапевти - Ми ретельно вивчаємо та перевіряємо всіх терапевтів, які знаходяться на платформі Rozmova. Ми перевіряємо їхню вищу освіту та професійні дипломи. Ми також підтримуємо прозору та надійну систему відгуків і приділяємо пильну увагу скаргам клієнтів. Ви можете перевірити всі дипломи та сертифікати на сторінках профілів наших терапевтів. Перед бронюванням сеансу ви можете переглянути відеовізитку терапевта та дізнатися про їх терапевтичний підхід. Крім того, ви можете зв'язатися з фахівцем через чат, щоб уточнити будь-які питання до початку сеансу. - Плануйте сесії у зручний для вас час В Rozmova клієнти можуть бронювати терапевтичні сесії з доступними терапевтами в той самий день, на відміну від інших платформ, де для запису необхідно вставати в чергу. Ми розуміємо, що психічне здоров'я є надзвичайно важливим і до нього слід ставитися відповідно. Саме тому за допомогою Rozmova ви можете забронювати терапевтичний сеанс і проконсультуватися з психологом або психотерапевтом вже сьогодні! Ви отримаєте миттєве запрошення на подію в Google Календарі з усіма деталями вашого майбутнього сеансу. Крім того, ви отримаєте сповіщення за три години до сеансу, щоб не пропустити його. - Відвідуйте сесії з будь-якого пристрою - Ми інтегрували сервіси Google в Rozmova, а це означає, що Google Meet і Google Calendar доступні на нашій платформі. Одразу після бронювання ви отримаєте посилання на Google Meet для вашої сесії. Ви можете використовувати це посилання, щоб приєднатися до сесії з телефону, планшета або браузера комп'ютера. Це одноразове посилання гарантує, що всі відеодзвінки є безпечними та конфіденційними відповідно до протоколів безпеки Google. - Зручно спілкуйтеся зі своїм терапевтом - Rozmova пропонує інтуїтивно зрозумілу функцію чату, яка дозволяє вам зв'язатися з будь-яким з наших терапевтів і поставити запитання. Це дає вам можливість отримати інформацію безпосередньо від обраних фахівців, з якими ви плануєте працювати, що допоможе вам почуватися більш впевнено у своєму виборі. - Служба підтримки клієнтів - Ми доступні 24/7. Якщо вам потрібна технічна допомога, у вас є фінансові питання або ви хочете отримати пораду щодо вибору спеціаліста вперше, наша команда підтримки завжди готова допомогти. У вашому особистому кабінеті ви маєте швидкий доступ до підтримки через чат. Ми прагнемо якнайшвидше допомогти вам з будь-якими питаннями, а для більш поширених запитань ми організували чіткі та докладні статті.

name: O7 Therapy
developer: MTI for Technology and Project Management
description: O7 Therapy is an online platform that offers convenient access to psychotherapy In the midst of all the hustle and jammed life we’re living; we’re in need of a convenient, confidential, and high-quality platform with certified psychotherapists and psychologists to assist us when needed. O7 Therapy uses the power of online technology to make this possible; for adults, couples and parents. You can now access a wide range of qualified therapists with high confidentiality and privacy tools to ensure the security of your data and information, from the palm of your hand. How does O7 Therapy work? 1. Download our mobile application or visit our website. 2. Identify your challenge (or we can help you through our matching tool). 3. Browse through therapists of all specialties. 4. Choose the therapist's available dates and times. 5. Book your therapist. 6. Pay for your session. 7. Start your online therapy session from the comfort of your home on O7 Therapy’s mobile application Who are our therapists? O7 Therapy has a wide network of therapists with diverse expertise and backgrounds. All Therapists in the network are licensed, trained, qualified, and accredited with Masters Degree or Doctorate Degree in their field. How are therapists verified? 1. Therapists send us their resumes for initial review by our medical team. 2. Therapists get interviewed. 3. Therapists are asked to send all their certificates to be verified and reviewed by our medical team. Is O7 Therapy secured? Your privacy and confidentiality are our top priorities. O7 Therapy was designed with specialized infrastructure and advanced technology to protect your data and information. Read more details about our privacy and confidentiality standards below 1. You can choose to stay anonymous. We will only ask you to add a nickname to be identified on our system, we will not ask you for your full name or contact information. 2. All data is Encrypted End-to-End Chat Encryption allows for a secured communication where only the intended recipient can read the secured message. 3. Sessions are not recorded Any video or audio communication with your therapist will not be recorded. Only text messages with your therapist are saved for your reference, in case you'd like to get back to them and you always have the option to delete specific or all messages saved. We are always delighted to connect with our clients and receive feedback. Email us: contact@o7therapy.com Check out our website: https://O7therapy.com Follow us on Instagram: instagram.com/o7therapy/ Like our page on Facebook: facebook.com/o7therapy/

name: Психолог онлайн & саморазвитие
description: Ясно — сервис ментального здоровья №1 в России, созданный психологами в 2017 году. Мы помогаем понять свои желания и чувства и решиться на перемены к лучшему. Разобраться в себе и обрести уверенность. Находить выход из сложных ситуаций и ощутить внутреннюю силу и свободу выбора.

name: Shmoody: Mood & Habit Tracker
description: Shmoody: Your Personalized Wellness Companion Shmoody is your all-in-one self-care and personal growth toolkit, designed to help you navigate tough moments and build uplifting habits over time. We're here to make feeling good feel possible. Think of us as a space for actionable strategies and uplifting tools to help you feel more balanced, supported, and energized—no matter where you’re starting. WHAT YOU’LL DISCOVER IN SHMOODY: Mood Tracker: Reflect and gain insights into your patterns over time. Instant Boosts: Explore simple actions designed to lift your spirits and energize your day. Community Support: Connect with like-minded peers for encouragement and accountability. Personal Growth Challenges: Take small steps that add up to meaningful progress. Shmoody isn’t just an app—it’s your companion in cultivating a life filled with joy and purpose. A PERSONALIZED, RELATABLE APPROACH TO WELL-BEING We’ve been there too. Feeling stuck, unsure of what to do next. That’s why we created Shmoody—to provide practical, science-backed tools and a welcoming, approachable space to explore what works for you. WHY CHOOSE SHMOODY? Shmoody is about taking one small step at a time toward feeling better and living well. It's built on real-world insights and designed to fit seamlessly into your life. No pressure, no judgment—just simple, effective tools to support you along the way.

name: Cabana Live
description: Manage your mental health on your terms with Cabana. Cabana is your go-to mental health support—confidential and ready when you are. With no waitlists, no co-pays, and no pressure, Cabana offers support that actually fits into your day (even the messy ones). With over 100+ live groups per month, you can connect with others who truly get you in a safe, professionally-lead discussion. Cabana Live Features PERSONALIZED LIVE GROUP COACHING Connect with peers in professionally-moderated small groups. Our moderators will coach you on a variety of wellness topics, personalizing the content to your unique needs. 98% of our members report feeling better after attending a live group. Here are some of our live group topics: * Personalized Guided Meditation * How To Be Alone Without Being Lonely * Desk Yoga * Self-Care for Busy Parents * Understanding Your Anxiety * Getting Rid of Negative Self-Talk 24/7 LIVE RADIO Tune into continuous lo-fi music designed to help you relax, focus, and stay in flow while you work. Start listening today and make your work sessions feel a little lighter and calmer. GUIDED JOURNAL Choose from themes like Gratitude Practice, Self-Discovery, Emotional Processing, and Dream Reflection to match your mood. Each journal comes with a thoughtful prompt to help you get started, and once you’ve shared your thoughts, you’ll receive a warm, personalized reflection that highlights what matters most to you. Plus, with actionable insights—like gentle reminders to spend quality time with loved ones—you can turn your reflections into meaningful moments in real life. MOOD TRACKING Knowledge is power. Use our mood-tracking tools to help identify patterns and improve your mental health. Based on your mood for the day, you will receive recommended resources from Cabana Live. MICROLEARNING Every day we give you short-form content designed to help you build your emotional and mental wellbeing toolkits. We know that you're busy, so 85% of our content take 5 minutes or less, and can be done on your own time. Replace doomscrolling on social media with a few minutes of evidence-informed content on Cabana Live to start improving your wellbeing and building healthy habits. BREATHING VIDEOS Cabana Live’s guided breathing exercise videos help you relax, refocus, and recharge. Whether you're starting your day, winding down, or need a moment of calm between meetings, these short, science-backed videos offer simple breathing techniques to support your mental well-being anytime, anywhere. What real members are saying about Cabana: - "I am starting to realize so much about myself through the Cabana sessions I join." - "My co-worker talked about how much she enjoyed everything about Cabana last year and I decided to join this year. I have joined two groups this year so far and I have enjoyed each one very much." - "Having this tool is so valuable for my mental and physical health. Loved it!" If your Cabana Live access is provided by an employer, health insurance provider, or sponsored organization, it's free for you to use. You will need your organization's unique access code to create an account. Don't know your organization's access code? Contact us at support@yourcabana.com for details.

name: Headspace Care (Ginger)
description: Ginger is now Headspace Care Headspace Care offers confidential mental health support with live, text-based coaching, video-based therapy and psychiatry, and a library of skill-building resources — all from the privacy of your smartphone. Our coaching model Coaches provide support through real-time, text-based conversations in the app, so you can easily and privately chat with a coach anytime, anywhere. Coaches are available 24/7 for immediate in-the-moment care and via regularly scheduled sessions. We know texting isn’t easy for everyone, which is why we also offer a speech-to-text option. Coaches also help you get the right level of care and can connect you to a Headspace Care therapist or psychiatrist if you need extra support. About our mental health coaches Headspace Care coaches are trained professionals with an advanced degree and/or coaching certification. Headspace Care coaches have at least two years of professional work experience and undergo an additional 100+ hours of specialized training every year. Coaches are full-time employees of Headspace Care, and yes — they’re real people. Therapy and psychiatry When more support is needed, video-based sessions with a licensed therapist and/or psychiatrist are available, with evening and weekend hours. If you feel therapy and psychiatry may be helpful, please reach out to a coach. Guided resources Our in-app library of skill-building resources includes activities, podcasts, videos, articles, and more. New recommendations are suggested based on your needs and can help you with a range of topics, such as anxiety, stress, relationships, and career challenges. Available in English, Spanish, and French Headspace Care is available in English, Spanish, and French. Note that services offered may vary by language and region. Confidential and secure Conversations between you and your care team are confidential. Headspace Care is HIPAA and EU GDPR compliant and HITRUST CSF certified. What does it cost? Select employers and organizations offer Headspace Care, including unlimited mental health coaching, at no cost to their employees, members, and their dependents. Depending on your employer or organization’s plan, you may have a limited number of therapy and psychiatry sessions covered, after which you would be responsible for the cost of the session not covered by your insurance. Depending on your health plan, the cost for accessing coaching, therapy and psychiatry services through Headspace Care may vary depending on your specific benefit plan. Please contact your benefits administrator for more information. Get started If you have access through your employer, download the app and tap “My Organization,” and follow the steps. If you have access through your health plan, you may have received an email from Headspace Care with a unique code. Simply download the app, tap “Enter an Access Code,” then enter the code from the Headspace Care email and follow the steps.

name: Motivation - Daily quotes
description: Whether you're going through hard times, need an extra push to get stuff done, or like sharing inspirational quotes on social media, Motivation has you covered. Positive reminders are one of the simplest and most powerful tools for mental growth. It’s all about keeping the right thoughts top of mind from the get-go every day, so they’re readily available on those hard days when you need them most. Now, from iOS 14, you can think positive thoughts without even trying with the Motivation widget! Simply install the widget in your home screen and customize it from the app. You can have as many widgets as you want! Customize the design of the quotes and share the uplifting message of the day with your friends, or use the image for Instagram or as a wallpaper. The app includes a wide range of topics such as self-esteem, relationships, and dealing with stress, as well as a selection of carefully designed themes to choose from - updated frequently. + Read through Hundreds of Quotes + Find Motivational Books + Save or Share your Quotes + Set Motivational Reminders throughout the Day + Save your Favorite Quotes + Change Font and Colors + Filter Quotes by Category + Set a Home Screen Motivation Widget From quotes about working out to love and family quotes, Motivation has them all! Browse thousands of quotes organized by category: - Motivation to work harder - Love quotes - Motivation to train and work out - Help for depression - Boost your self-esteem and self-confidence - Get over a break up - Life lessons and sayings - Sports quotes from athletes and trainers - Business, money, success, and career - Being present and mindful - Quotes from and for women - Philosophy from the best minds - Quotes to be thankful for what you got - Inspirations for joy - Quotes from movies - Verses from the Bible - And much more! And now with Motivation Premium you can: + Remove ads + Unlock all themes and categories + Set background photo + Get unlimited reminders + Search quotes To get access to the Motivation Premium content and functionality, you can choose between a lifetime, monthly, and yearly auto-renewable subscription. This is a recurring transaction that will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew unless you cancel it at least 24 hours before the end of your subscription. Renewals will be charged at the same cost within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage your subscriptions and auto-renewal can be turned off by going to your iTunes Account Settings after purchase. Find tons of inspiring content on our blog: https://blog.motivation.app/ Privacy Policy: https://monkeytaps.net/privacy Terms of Use: https://monkeytaps.net/terms

name: Brightline Mental Health
description: Brightline is your home for virtual therapy, coaching, and psychiatry for kids and teens ages 0–17. Created by parents, for parents, caregivers, and kids, Brightline’s experts are here to support your child’s mental health challenges like ADHD, worries, sadness, and self-esteem. We can help you and your children navigate transitions, difficult behaviors, and dynamics at every age and stage of life. A few things to know about Brightline: IN-NETWORK: We are in-network with many major health plans and employers (and if we’re out-of-network, we’ll help you request reimbursement). VIRTUAL: Live video visits are available M–F, 9am–5pm local time. LIVE SESSIONS: Coaching sessions are 30 minutes, therapy sessions are 55 minutes. MESSAGING: Message your coach anytime. EXPERTS: Our therapists and psychiatrists are licensed mental health experts. And our behavioral health coaches hold a master’s degree in a psychology-related field or a bachelor’s degree with a certification in coaching. Brightline is also the home of BrightLife Kids, a CalHOPE program by Brightline. No costs attached. No insurance required. No referrals needed. If you live in California, you have access to the BrightLife Kids program at no cost to you! This program is paid for by the State of California. It serves every family in California with kids ages 0–12 with virtual behavioral health coaching, 24/7 secure messaging, and an on-demand library of helpful articles and videos. A few things to know about BrightLife Kids: NO-COST: This program is offered at no cost for families and kids ages 0–12 in California. VIRTUAL: Live, 30-minute video visits are available M–F, 9am–8pm PT. MESSAGING: Message your coach anytime. GUIDANCE: Our Care Guides can help you evaluate care options and connect your family to supportive services. EXPERTS: Our behavioral health coaches hold a master’s degree in a psychology-related field or a bachelor’s degree with a certification in coaching. BrightLife Kids coaches speak both English and Spanish, are trained and experienced with LGBTQ+ and BIPOC populations, and are culturally diverse. California families can get started by downloading the Brightline app, entering California as their home state, and creating an account. Parenting can be tough, but getting help shouldn’t be. Get the support your family needs today.

name: 5-minute Mental Health
description: 5-minute Mental Health over 100 videos that are short, packed with educational information, and engaging to watch. Many categories to choose from

name: UpLife: CBT Therapy, Self-Care
description: UpLife is your personal inner wellbeing companion, offering a collection of tools to support emotional balance and personal growth. The app includes guided journeys, AI-based mood tracking, habit-forming rituals, meditations, and self-reflection exercises — all designed to help you build a more fulfilling life. Just a Quick Note: UpLife is NOT a medical app. It does not provide medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. All content is for personal development and educational purposes only. We strongly recommend consulting a healthcare provider for any mental health concerns. Our app is based on the principles of Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) and personal development techniques. It is designed to provide self-help and educational content, helping you better understand your emotions, improve your self-awareness, and build healthier habits — all in just 15 minutes a day. How UpLife Supports You: * Guided Journeys – Step-by-step courses designed to help you manage stress, build self-esteem, and improve emotional resilience. * AI-Based Mood Tracking – Understand patterns in your mood and receive personalized insights. * Habit Tracker – Reinforce positive habits and get gentle reminders to stay on track. * Meditations & Mindfulness – Improve focus and relaxation with guided sessions. * Interactive Exercises – Reflect on your thoughts and emotions with engaging exercises. Powered by OpenAI for Privacy and Security: Our AI model is built using the OpenAI engine, ensuring that your data is handled securely and responsibly. All personal data is protected according to strict privacy standards, and insights are generated with the latest advancements in AI technology to provide personalized and secure support. UpLife helps you manage stress, increase motivation, strengthen your self-esteem, and improve your relationships — without overwhelming you. Each course session is under 15 minutes, making it easy to incorporate into your daily routine. Free Access for Ukraine: If the application was installed from the Ukrainian store, it is completely free. Subscription Information: For all other countries: We offer several subscription options so that you can choose the right one for you (weekly, quarterly, and yearly renewals). Subscriptions are set to auto-renew within 24 hours prior to the end date. You can cancel anytime from your iTunes account settings. Disclaimer: This application does not offer any medical treatment. All the information presented through this app is intended for educational and advisory purposes only. We strongly recommend seeking a doctor's advice in conjunction with using this app and before making any medical decisions. We Value Your Feedback: We are open to feedback and suggestions. Contact our support team via info@uplife.app. - Privacy Policy – https://www.uplife.app/privacy-policy - Terms of Use – https://www.uplife.app/terms-of-use

name: MTBH Portal
developer: MARK TWAIN ASSOCIATION FOR MENTAL HEALTH, INC.
description: Introducing the MTBH Portal, a user-focused platform that puts your care experience in your hands. This innovative app offers seamless access to tools and features designed to make managing your mental health journey simple and efficient. Here’s what it provides: Effortless Appointment Scheduling Easily plan, reschedule, or cancel sessions with a sleek and intuitive system tailored for your convenience. Appointment Alerts Stay ahead of your schedule with proactive notifications, ensuring you’re always prepared for your next session. Secure Virtual Consultations Connect with your provider via protected video calls, enabling worry-free telehealth appointments. Organized Document Management Handle important paperwork with ease—review, upload, sign, and securely store your forms in one place. Uncompromised Data Protection Rest assured knowing your personal and health information is safeguarded with advanced privacy measures. Join countless others who trust the MTBH Portal to take control of their mental health care with confidence. Download the app today to start your journey toward a better you!

name: Manatee - family mental health
description: Mental health for today's family Manatee is here to help your family grow closer together and thrive! We empower parents and adolescents with resources to learn more about each other, build healthy habits, tools to cope with big feelings, and connect more deeply. Every family can benefit from Manatee, but especially if: - The harmony in your family feels off… - Day-to-day activities are a struggle - You’re worried about your kid, but not sure what is ‘normal’ - You feel like you’re just surviving… not thriving! - You could use some support, but don’t know where to start - You just want to be the best parent you can be! Are you looking for a little more? You’d like to explore family or child therapy? Parent coaching? No need to look any further! You can match with a licensed therapist as soon as TODAY. Families who need additional support have NO WAITLIST access to a team of family experts, like licensed therapists and parent coaches and will continue to use our app to supercharge your family’s treatment, too. MANATEE’S FEATURES - Goals: Build healthy habits as a family. Encourage adolescents to build their self-esteem, give them tools to work on big feelings, and more. - Rewards: Fun family rewards that will help you celebrate success. - Chatbot: Built to interact with your kid and provide mindfulness exercises. - Courses: Lessons developed by experts and loved by parents. - Family connection: Come together as a family and learn something new about each other! Families in our clinical care also have access to the following features: - Instant messaging with their team of care coordinators, therapists or coaches. - A treatment plan with goals tailored for their family’s needs. - Regular check-ins and assessments to track progress. HOW DOES IT WORK? Your family can use Manatee independently. It’s pretty simple: download the app and add your kid(s) and any co-parents or caregivers to your account. Then set up your goals, rewards, and maybe pick a self-guided course, and you’re good to go! But… If you feel like your family needs more support, then we’ve got your back there, too. The Manatee app works best as a companion to our Family Care model! Here’s how that works: 1. Book your consult Have a free 20-minute call with a family expert so we can get to know your family. If it’s a good fit, we’ll schedule your intake session. 2. Assessment and intake After you complete your assessment, you’ll review your results with your therapist, discuss your family’s unique needs and create your 6-week care plan together. 3. Start your 6-week care plan It’s time to get your family’s groove back! Our care plan includes weekly therapy/coaching sessions and our family app that helps put your hard earned knowledge into practice.

name: Lore Health
description: Take a few minutes for yourself — and earn real rewards along the way. Lore gives you a private space to pause and talk through whatever’s on your mind. Sleep, relationships, health — focus on what matters to you, and earn rewards as you go. A place to talk things out LoreBot is a simple, friendly chatbot designed to listen as you talk things through. You set the pace, choose the topic, and decide where the conversation goes. No scripts, no programs, no lectures. Real rewards for everyday conversations When you spend a few minutes thinking things through in Lore, you earn points you can use for real rewards, like money for groceries. A small thank-you for taking a little time for yourself. A community that’s there when you need it In Lore, you can read and share real-life moments from other people figuring things out, one day at a time. Lore’s community is anonymous and online, so it’s always just a tap away. Private and in your control Your conversations with LoreBot are confidential. You control who can see your data. Look for your invite Lore is offered through participating organizations, such as your health plan. Check your invite for a QR code to get started.

name: Sort AI: Your Mental Companion
description: Sort AI is your intelligent companion, built with mental health professionals, to help you untangle complex emotions and find clarity. Whether you're overwhelmed by thoughts, dealing with burnout, or simply need space to vent - Sort AI is here to help you sort through it all. WHY CHOOSE SORT AI: Most AI chatbots focus on giving quick answers and solving your problems. Sort AI, on the other hand, is like a companion who chats with you at your own pace, helping you reflect along the way. Drawing from proven psychological frameworks, it highlights patterns in your thoughts and works with you to find the answers or actions that fit you best. Think of it this way: ChatGPT answers questions. Sort AI helps you understand yourself. SORT AI CAN HELP YOU WITH: • Processing complex emotions and understanding what's really going on inside • Understanding relationship patterns and communication challenges • Working through life transitions and identity questions • Managing stress, burnout, and emotional exhaustion • Finding clarity when you feel stuck or confused • Building self-awareness and emotional intelligence WHY PEOPLE LOVE SORT AI: • Available 24/7 - no appointments, no waiting • Designed with input from mental health professionals • Learns your unique patterns for increasingly personalized support • Privacy-first design with end-to-end encryption • Helps you organize and understand your emotional growth IMPORTANT INFORMATION: Sort AI is an AI-powered tool designed for emotional support and self-reflection. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment, and does not provide clinical or crisis services. Your well-being matters. If you are in crisis, facing a mental health emergency, or considering self-harm, please contact a local crisis hotline or emergency services right away. This app is intended for users 18 years and older. Privacy Policy: www.getsort.ai/privacy-policy Terms of Service: www.getsort.ai/terms-and-conditions

name: Rootd: Panic Attacks & Anxiety
description: ** Editor's Choice ** — Apple ** App of the Day ** — Apple ** Approved for privacy, security, clinical assurance, and safety ** — DHAF & ORCHA Rootd is anxiety and panic attack relief in your pocket. Award-winning, scientifically validated, female led and seen in Women's Health, Time Magazine, Healthline and more. With millions of users worldwide, Rootd is the go-to app for anxiety & panic attacks for more and more people each day. “I’ve suffered from panic attacks for almost 10 years. I’ve done CBT, medication, meditation, but nothing helped me in the moment when that panic attack hit, until I downloaded Rootd. Rootd makes it feel like someone is with me, even when I’m alone. I owe my continued stability to this simple genius app. It's a MUST for all who are facing the same type of war.” RainyNally Understand, and overcome anxiety & panic attacks with Rootd’s therapist-approved panic button, guided deep breathing, anxiety journal, soothing visualizations, stats page, emergency contact, and lessons. We set out to build Rootd after suffering from panic attacks and anxiety for several years. The only help we could find was either too expensive, ineffective, or poorly designed. Our mission is to help others find accessible relief from their panic and anxiety, and to end the stigma against those affected. Finally, an app for conquering panic attacks and anxiety that blends a guided process for both immediate and long term relief, with clean and engaging design. Rootd’s core features and content include: THE ROOTR, PANIC ATTACK SOS BUTTON A panic button to bring a swift end to panic attacks based on the latest techniques in Cognitive Behavioural Therapy (CBT). LESSONS Find some peace of mind by learning about where anxiety comes from, how our bodies and minds experience panic attacks, and why this all might be happening to you. BREATHE The perfect tool to practice deep breathing daily and find calm during times of stress. JOURNAL Track and identify moods, habits, and subconscious triggers of anxiety and panic attacks. VISUALIZE Guided body scans, visualizations, ASMR, and nature sounds to get rooted when feeling anxious. SLEEP White noise, ASMR, sleep stories, relaxing sounds, and music for you to gain calm and sleep deeply. EMERGENCY CONTACT For when you need to hear a friendly voice, you can immediately call a friend, family member, or nearby help center directly from the app. PERSONAL STATS Take pride in your healing progress and gain appreciation for how far you’ve come. name: Hex: Anxiety Relief Relax Game

We strongly believe that this Hexes game may relieve you from moments of stress as there is no pressure to solve the levels and no timers at all. name: Stress Ball - Anxiety Relief
description: It's not a great feeling to be anxious. And when you are, it's tough to meditate without having the stressful thoughts slip back in. Fortunately, with Stress Ball, you can interact with your phone and clear your mind with exercises, fidgets and videos within the app. There are five different tabs you can use to calm down: Breathe, Fidget, ChillTok, Color & Reflect In the Breathe tab, there are breathing exercises to help you take deep breaths and calm down. You can customize your experience with relaxing sounds and backgrounds. The phone also vibrates and provides various animations to distract your thoughts. In the Fidget tab, there are virtual fidgets and toys you can play with to distract your mind and let out all of your anxious energy on the app. The fidgets also provide vibration and audio feedback to help you feel more relaxed. In the Feel tab, you can tap on ASMR sounds and feel the vibrations of the sounds!! These vibrations are super calming to the body and mind and will help you meditate your mind a lot easier. Give it a try!! In the Color tab, you can complete vibrating color by numbers. Coloring can help soothe your mind and distract you away from your stress. It also is great for fidgeting when feeling anxious, or to cope with ADHD symptoms as well. In the Reflect tab, you can journal and reflect about your feelings and emotions. You can also talk through your feelings with StressBot, a virtual therapist! You can always swipe through a lot of different types of quotes, such as Positive, Affirmations, Self-Love and Stress Relief. You also can record a smile everyday to force yourself to feel happier! In all these tabs you can play super calming soundscapes while interacting with the exercises and videos. Simply press the music icon in the top right corner and select from many different soothing music and noises. Have a great time using Stress Ball and we hope you find which options work the best for relieving your anxiety! name: Worrydolls
description: Worrydolls gives you a small doll who is ready to listen to what is worrying you. Tell your worry to the doll, then track it over time. You can use Worrydolls like a journal to help you overcome anxiety and stress. The idea of worrydolls started with the indigenous people of Guatemala. The first worrydoll was given to the princess Ixucane as a special gift from the sun god, with the promise that the worrydoll could handle any worry a person could have. Ever since, tiny worrydolls made leftover cloth have been given to worried people. Whisper a single worry to the worrydoll, and hide it under their pillow. As soon as the worrydoll is told the worry, sorrow, or fear, it takes the burden and carries it from then on. The app works the same way! Just tell a single worry to the Worrydoll, and the Worrydoll will carry it for you. In this way, you can have worrydolls on your phone. When your worry is finished, you can tell the worrydoll that he/she does not need to worry anymore. You can always look back at your old worries to feel a sense of calm. My grandmother gave me tiny worrydolls because I was always worrying as a child. Now, you can have Worrydolls on your phone. I hope that the worrydolls can help you just like they helped me. Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

name: Anxiety Test⁺

description: Improve your stress, sleep, and more with Balance’s personalized guided meditation program. YOUR PERSONAL MEDITATION COACH Balance is your personal meditation coach. You’ll discover how to bring awareness to your day, increase your focus among distractions, and find deep relaxation in moments of stress. TAKE YOUR MEDITATION PRACTICE TO THE NEXT LEVEL Get started with our Foundations Plan, where you’ll train your focus and reduce anxiety. Or, if you already meditate often, start with our Advanced Plan, which helps you take your meditation practice to the next level. name: Infinity Loop: Relaxing Puzzle
description: Simple, relaxing, endless game. People love it! ∞ Infinity Loop is a fun way of increasing your logic skills. It can be considered a puzzle game about creating intricate looping patterns or just the application of using a simple concept: "connecting multiple things" and make fun out of it. Some people say this game is a good puzzle game but with a great zen mode. The goal is to clear your mind, remove the stress from your daily life without any pressure or tension to solve the levels. If you are looking for stress relief or a relaxing game type, enjoy the loop! FAQ How to Play Infinity Loop? Connect all the lines and corners to make perfect connections. It is like killing the chaos and reaching perfection. Watch the video to overview how it works. Check on youtube as well where several people post the solutions. Nonetheless, we suggest you try to find yourself how the game works and what you are supposed to do. How to Play the Infinity Dark Mode? The goal of the dark mode is to make disconnections, breaking it all and not leaving a single piece connected. How many levels the game has? Infinite. How can I save my game progress? Make sure you connect the app with the App Store on the settings panel (the button is at the bottom of the gameplay). This way your progress won't be lost. If you face further issues reach us by email. Do I need to pay anything to play Infinity Loop? No. The original game is 100% free. There is no need to pay anything for the original game. The game is free for unlimited levels. Only if you opt for the secondary game, called "black mode", you may need to pay a coffee for it after level 100. I don't feel the game is challenging. Why? The challenge for us would be making the game with increasing difficulty after a certain level while at the same time relaxing and allowing infinity levels. So how could level 100.000 be more difficult than level 10.000? It is hard. So as we cannot have the best in all worlds, we have opted to make it relaxing for now. Note: This game is also available on Apple Watches. And it's very fun as well! Concept and Development: Jonas Lekevicius, Balys Valentukevicius & the WebAvenue LTD Team Design & Logo Copyright: Alice Gmyrko & the WebAvenue LTD Team

name: Loóna: Sleep, reduce anxiety
description: - WHAT IS LOÓNA? loóna is the first app that lets you quickly disconnect from a long stressful day and get in the right mood for sleep. - SO, IT'S ANOTHER SLEEP APP, RIGHT? Not exactly. loóna isn’t a list of direct go-to-sleep techniques, but rather a mood-altering app that helps you to stay calm during the day and prepares you emotionally for going to sleep in the evening. - WHY IS BEDTIME MOOD IMPORTANT? Negative emotions we accumulate during the day are processed and consolidated by our brain during sleep making them more difficult to disassociate from when faced again in the future. Moreover, feeling angry, anxious, down, or, the opposite, excited, and elated, is likely to affect latencies to sleep onset and REM-sleep. People mistake it for the symptoms of a sleep disorder, but in reality, they just may be in the wrong mood for sleep. - HOW DOES LOÓNA WORK? From the wake up and during the busy day Loóna will support your emotional states with playlists and immersive stories. Each night you’ll have a recommended escape. An escape is a guided session that combines activity-based relaxation, storytelling, and sounds in a unique way. Complete it to shut the frantic world out, reset your mind, and create the perfect mood for sleep. Loóna saves your escape sessions to your Apple Health app. The upgrade to loóna PLUS provides access to the entire collection of escapes. name: Anxiety, Panic & Stress Relief
description: We are glad to present an application for people suffering from panic attacks and anxiety disorder. The app includes a set of exercises for shifting attention and suppressing anxiety attacks. We know that anxiety is one of the first stages of a panic attack that cannot be controlled. A set of exercises will help to remove the symptoms of anxiety, not allowing it to develop any further. One of the authors of the application once also faced the problem of sudden panic attacks, which for a long time did not let him fully experience his life. Based on our and other people’s experience of suffering from panic attacks, we have added a number of exercises that involve various human senses, preventing you from concentrating on an anxiety attack. Exercises: Breathing exercise. One of the most important parts of suppressing an anxiety attack is the normalization of a person's breathing cycle in order to prevent hyperventilation and dizziness. This is a simple step-by-step exercise for inhaling, holding your breath and exhaling. Visual and vibro signals indicate the duration of each step in the cycle. The application functions provide the ability to customize the exercise for your liking. The app features allow you to choose an exercise preset to align with your mental state, for example, when a panic or anxiety attack occurs, when you are stressed out, or just want to relax. Sound identification exercise. The exercise involves the organs of hearing. The application generates an audio track by mixing several common sounds with different volume levels. The user is to correlate the sounds heard with the images presented. Visual concentration exercise. The exercise involves the organs of vision. The user is to find and take a picture of several items that fit the randomly generated color patterns. AI Therapy This feature is based on artificial intelligence and provides the opportunity for live communication with a virtual psychotherapist. You can ask any questions about the nature of anxiety and panic attacks, get valuable advice or just chat. Journal Daily Journal. In the Daily Journal you can track: Whether you had a panic or anxiety attack on the selected date or not. Severity of the attack Place where the attack occurred A possible reason for the attack occurring Start and end time of the attack A possible reason for the attack ending Your total mood during the day All tracked data will help both you - for a general understanding of your health condition, and your attending therapist - for a more accurate diagnosis and selection of the correct course of treatment. Medical treatment. The app features allow you to add a course of medication prescribed by your therapist, for example, if you started taking antidepressants, tranquilizers, or any other medications. Using this functionality, you can specify: Name of the prescribed medication Treatment duration The frequency of taking the medication in days, for example, if you need to take it not every day, but every other day The frequency of taking the medication per day Dosage of medication, relative to intake count per day Additionally, in the Daily Journal, you can note whether the medicine was taken, which will allow you to discipline your medication treatment and remember to take the medicine on time. The overall picture will let you and your therapist know whether the chosen course of treatment has a positive or negative effect. The application is therapeutic in nature and will help to relieve the symptoms, but it will not be able to get rid of the source of the problem. The source of the problem is individual and hidden deeper within, so we strongly recommend contacting the appropriate specialist to solve the source of the problem. We would be really grateful if you could share your ideas and suggestions, as well as rate the app so that more people will know about us. Take care of yourself and your loved ones.

name: StressWatch: AI Stress Monitor
description: StressWatch has been featured on the Apple App Store in 171 countries and regions — # Best of August # The Best Apps for iOS 18 # Better Understand Your Wellbeing # Essential Watch Apps # Featured New App # Our Favorite of This Week StressWatch relies on your RHR (Resting Heart Rate) and HRV (Heart Rate Variability) data retrieved from Apple Health. We'll analyze and interpret the data to determine your current stress levels. We constantly monitor your status and remind your immediately if your stress levels get too high so you can take action right away to help reduce your stress levels. #How can StressWatch help you? - When you work late into the night, StressWatch can remind you that your HRV is low and you're stressed - a gentle reminder to help you understand that it's time to get some rest. - When you're at a social event and you have to force yourself to smile, we'll remind you that your HRV is low and you're stressed - a gentle reminder to get some fresh air and recharge. - When you've had just a bit too much to drink, we'll remind you that your HRV is low and you're stressed (because alcohol is a stresssor) - a gentle reminder to let up a bit on the cup, drink some water, and take care of your body. - You can constantly monitor your HRV levels (and stress levels) from your Apple Watch by adding StressWatch to your Watch Face. - Paired with proper exercise and adequate rest, monitor and analyze your weekly and monthly stress levels over prolonged periods of time; you'll realize that you're getting better as time goes on. #Design Concept We created StressWatch with the sole intention to help people to reduce anxiety in this age of stress and pressure. However, data and numbers do not have any meaning if the user is unable to interpret the data. (Not everyone is a rocket scientist!) So it got us thinking: how can we design a app that delivers numbers and data in a friendly manner that will help users to reduce stress and anxiety. Thus, we created the "Mr.Fizz", which is the foundation of our product design. The "Mr.Fizz" will change colors as the user's stress levels rise. #Contact us Email: hi@stresswatch.app Subscription prices and terms StressWatch can be downloaded for free. If you choose to upgrade to the StressWatch Pro version, you can unlock all paid features. We offer two different purchase options: monthly, and annual auto-renewal. For monthly or annual subscriptions: Once confirmed and paid, it will automatically renew through your Apple iTunes account. After successful payment, the subscription period will be extended. To cancel, please manually turn off the auto-renewal feature in iTunes/Apple ID settings management at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. During the trial period, if you do not cancel the subscription, it will automatically activate and charge at the end of the trial period. This service is at your discretion to cancel; if you choose not to cancel, the renewal service for the next billing cycle will be activated for you. Health advice disclaimer All information provided by StressWatch cannot be considered medical advice or diagnosis, and should not replace professional diagnosis and treatment. If you feel excessive stress that cannot be adjusted, and before making any medical decisions, please seek professional medical help in a timely manner. User Agreement: https://docs.ideation.love/stresswatch/en/service/terms-of-use.html Privacy Policy: https://docs.ideation.love/stresswatch/en/service/privacy-policy.html

name: MindShift CBT - Anxiety Relief
description: MindShift CBT: Manage Anxiety with Evidence-Based Tools MindShift CBT is a free, evidence-based self-help app using Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) strategies to help manage anxiety, stress, and panic. Users can challenge negative thoughts, track progress, practice mindfulness, and access coping tools, including belief experiments, fear ladders, and guided meditations. Features include a daily check-in, goal setting, coping statements, relaxation exercises, and a Community Forum for peer support. MindShift CBT provides practical, science-backed strategies to support anxiety management and overall well-being.

name: Present Sense: Anxiety Journal
description: Calm anxiety and panic one moment at a time. Present Sense is a practical mindfulness and journaling app built to help you shift out of stress, worry, or panic and into grounded awareness using evidence-based tools from mindfulness, CBT (Cognitive Behavioral Therapy), EMDR-inspired techniques, somatic tracking, and everyday sensory exercises. No jargon. No overwhelm. Just tools that work. Whether you want to reduce anxiety, build emotional resilience, cultivate self-compassion and self-acceptance, or learn how to actually enjoy ordinary moments, Present Sense gives you simple, guided activities that fit real life - not unrealistic meditation fantasies. CORE FEATURES - 40+ guided mindful experiences to anchor your attention in the present moment - Therapy-informed tools including the Worry Tree, Butterfly Hug (EMDR bilateral stimulation), somatic tracking, grounding, and resourcing exercises - Free Journal mode anytime you want to reflect without structure - Journaling prompts after each activity to strengthen awareness, emotional regulation, and pattern recognition - Daily gratitude practice to build positivity and appreciation - Daily affirmations to support a more positive mental baseline - Daily intentions (Be Patient, Be Kind, Be Playful, Practice Self-Compassion, and more) to guide your day with purpose - Configurable "Everyday" experiences to bring mindfulness into normal tasks—cleaning, commuting, walking, etc. - Reminders & notifications to help you keep mindfulness in your day - Timers for activities and daily practices - Full history of all your journal entries and experiences (now free!) - Stats + analytics including word clouds built from your journal entries - iCloud sync to securely back up and sync your journal and intentions across devices - Instant Journal mode for activities you already know—skip the instructions and go straight to writing - S.O.S. calming section: fast access to grounding, breathing, and de-escalation tools - Widgets for inspiration, quick journaling, and daily reminders (Premium) NEED HELP NOW? The S.O.S. section gives you instant access to calming tools when anxiety or panic hits: breathing exercises, grounding techniques, and guided de-escalation. No scrolling. No setup. Just immediate relief when you need it most. WHY IT WORKS Mindfulness changes your brain through repetition and awareness - not by trying to "think positive," but by learning to actually feel the present moment. Present Sense helps you train that skill in manageable, real-life bursts that build into powerful habits over time. Pair it with CBT-style reflection, self-compassion practices, and somatic grounding, and you get a practical system for calming your nervous system, improving emotional awareness, and breaking old stress loops. Daily intentions and gratitude help rewire your mind toward resilience and acceptance. WHO IT'S FOR - People who want mindfulness without the spiritual fluff - Anyone dealing with anxiety, panic attacks, overthinking, or stress spirals - Journaling beginners or veterans who want guided structure - People exploring EMDR-adjacent techniques (like Butterfly Hug) or CBT tools - Those seeking to build self-compassion and self-acceptance - Anyone trying to build healthy, repeatable habits that actually stick - Those who appreciate a calm, modern journaling experience backed by real evidence-based practices like MBSR, ACT, and DBT principles PREMIUM FEATURES - All daily intentions - Widgets for home + lock screen - Additional experiences and advanced journaling features - Upcoming expansions to therapy-based tools and S.O.S. section Present Sense Premium is optional. Many features remain free. Monthly and yearly auto-renewing subscriptions Manage your subscription in your Apple ID settings Start grounding yourself in the present—and finally feel more calm, connected, and in control.

name: Open: Breathwork + Meditation
description: “We believe that mindfulness is more than a form of stress relief — it can be a tool for personal growth, deeper understanding, vibrancy. More than a way to disconnect — it can be a way to feel a part of something bigger. More than simply silence — it can be immersive, beautiful, moving.” –Raed Khawaja, Open Co-founder & CEO Regulate your nervous system with Open. Bridge science and spirituality to cleanse your body and mind. Learn breathwork, meditation, and movement techniques designed by experts in neurobiology. Practice on the app and in-person at our flagship studio in Los Angeles. CLASSES BREATHE: Since the dawn of civilization, humans have developed techniques for manipulating our breath to induce desired states of consciousness. Now peer-reviewed studies in neuroscience and psychology confirm that breathwork is a powerful toolkit for regulating your nervous system, optimizing your health and well-being, and catalyzing personal transformation. Breathwork is an umbrella term for myriad practices, both ancient and modern. While many techniques are deeply rooted in spiritual traditions like Yoga, Qi Gong, and Buddhism, contemporary applications integrate ancient wisdom with modern science.This synthesis of ancient and modern has given rise to transformational breathwork, designed to induce profound experiences of catharsis, insight, and breakthrough. Experience a mental reset with just a few minutes of conscious breathing. MEDITATE: Train your awareness and contemplate wisdom – with techniques that span generations, cultures, and traditions – with our daily meditations and monthly programs. Learn how to enhance your focus, reduce your stress and anxiety, and regulate your emotions with simple mindfulness techniques you can incorporate into your daily life. MOVE: Our methodology is designed through the intelligence of fitness – blending endurance, strength, mobility, and recovery – with the wisdom of mindfulness. A ritual for resilience, strengthening the body and mind. ANYTIME, ANYWHERE: Practice on your time with our endless library, with fresh classes added daily. From simple 5-minute breathwork techniques, to 60-minute strength and conditioning classes, build your practice to fit your schedule and meet your goals. Whether you’re starting your journey or seeking a new challenge, there are classes for every level and mood. PROGRESS TRACKING: Create a daily habit that sticks with progress tracking, push reminders, streaks, and badges. A consistent breathwork and meditation practice has proven to reduce cortisol levels and regulate the nervous system–decreasing stress, supporting emotional well-being, and enhancing mental clarity. These techniques can also improve physical health by increasing heart rate variability, promoting cardiovascular health, and boosting immune function. CONNECT WITH US Questions? Email us: support@o-p-e-n.com. Follow along on Instagram: @op_e___n. NOTES Data: Open reads and writes data to the Apple Health App to help you track your Mindful minutes. No data is being sent outside of your device. This is optional. Pricing info: This pricing is for our customers in the United States. Pricing in other countries may vary. Your subscription to Open will automatically renew, unless you disable auto-renew at least 24 hours before the current period ends. You can turn off auto-renew or manage your subscription from your Apple account settings. Payment will be charged to your Apple account. You can read more about our terms of service here: https://o-p-e-n.com/terms and our privacy policy here: https://o-p-e-n.com/privacy.

name: Anxiety Test & Relief
description: The Anxiety Test & Relief is a powerful tool to evaluate anxiety disorder and monitor treatment response. The test questions are based on Generalized Anxiety Disorder 7 ("GAD-7"), which was developed by Drs. Robert L. Spitzer, Janet B.W. Williams, Kurt Kroenke and colleagues in 2006. It is the most widely used and trusted questionnaire among mental health professionals. The test can be self-administered. With Anxiety Test, you can: - take the GAD-7 questionnaire to screen for Anxiety disorder - store test results and monitor improvements over time - share your test results with a medical professional - keep a journal to track your mood - educate yourself with short, informative articles on Anxiety Disorder - use Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) techniques to identify and reframe your negative thoughts The CBT exercises include A-B-C, Socratic Questions, Challenge Core Beliefs, and De-catastrophizing. The exercises will help you identify and challenge your cognitive distortions that lead to negative thoughts. Read more about our Terms of Service here: https://www.mind-matters.co/terms-of-use Anxiety disorder can be effectively treated. Don't wait until things get worse. Disclaimer: This self-test should not be used as a replacement for professional treatment or guidance. You should consult a medical professional if you are concerned about your symptoms.

name: Stop Anxiety program
description: Stop Anxiety is the guide that shows you how the mind works, why you suffered from anxiety in the first place. It then gives you a step-by-step program to free yourself from destructive behavior and thoughts, and to gain freedom from the tyranny of thoughts and emotions, to come out from under the umbrella of fear and terror, i.e. to free yourself from anxiety. This program is for you if: ● you want to stop getting pissed off at the town hall, IRS, government, bank and a few other institutions and companies ● husband, mother-in-law and mother gang up on you and make your life miserable ● colleagues at work abuse/bully you ● you no longer trust yourself ● you have no motivation to do things ● procrastinate ● you lose control of your emotions, thoughts and body ● you think you will die And you want to: ● stop letting others influence your emotions ● stop caring about what others say ● regain the power and control you had before ● spend more time with yourself, stop being a slave to your husband, mother-in-law, children ● find the joy of living Free stress, anxiety and depression test ● Before launching the program, you have the opportunity to measure your levels of stress, anxiety and depression. These levels will drop after a week or two of getting into the program. ● Stop Anxiety offers a scientific method of self-diagnose, based on the DASS test https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DASS_(psychology) ● Make sure to seek a doctor’s advice in addition to using this app and before making any medical decisions. Structure of the STOP ANXIETY program Week 1 ● Discover that you are not the only one who suffers from anxiety, that this mood is normal, especially nowadays (psychological relaxation) ● Discover what is anxiety. Even after many sessions with a psychologist, people still don't know what Mrs. Anxiety (control) actually means ● Discover learn the purpose of anxiety - which is not to harm you, it's quite the opposite, in fact (peace) ● Discover learn and practice methods of staying in the present - mindful activities (relaxation, calmness) ● Discover how to handle a panic attack (safety) Week 2 ● Discover the most destructive expressions in your life, driving you into anxiety and self-sabotage (the enemy) ● Discover what you replace the enemy with, so you stop living in fear (detachment) ● Discover and practice to stop feeding your anxiety, and to stop beating yourself up (power, warmth) Week 3 ● Discover what is a thought and an emotion (control) ● Discover how to control your thoughts and emotions (control) ● Introduce the middle path, the golden path as a guiding value in your life (efficiency decisions) ● How can you stop worrying? (release) Week 4 ● Much of your anxiety is caused by the people you meet regularly. Discover how the drama triangle shapes your life (awareness) ● Count the abusers and rescuers in your life and discover how to manage them (control, self-protection) ● How do you get out of the victim role, stop being everyone's doormat? (personal power, confidence, control) ● Discover and practice to stop feeding your anxiety, and stop beating yourself up (power, warmth) Psychology for normal people ● Psychology only works when it is understood by normal people. We've taken the most widely used theories and techniques from the international literature and rewritten them in a much more understandable form. ● We know you don't have the time, so we've synthesized the psychological material for you to get the most out of it, with a minimum of time investment. Among the theories and techniques used are: ● CBT (Cognitive behavioral therapy) ● ACT (Acceptance and commitment therapy), ● MBCT (Mindfulness-based cognitive therapy). All these types of psychotherapy are scientifically proven to work in relieving anxiety and even depression! Good luck on the amazing journey that awaits you! Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
