description: FearTools is an evidence-based app designed to help you combat anxiety, aiding you on your road to recovery. This application is especially useful for those suffering from Generalized Anxiety Disorder, Phobias, and Social Anxiety Disorder. FearTools contains several simple, useful, and powerful tools. They include: Thought Diary - Challenge and reframe your unhelpful thoughts with this cognitive therapy technique Exposure - Overcome your fears with gradual exposure, an effective behavioral therapy technique Breathe - Relax with this simple and customizable paced breathing tool Information - Read information, follow self-help guidelines, and find additional resources Test - Take the GAD-7 anxiety questionnaire and track your symptom severity over time Video - Discover helpful YouTube videos that can improve your mood and behavior, from guided meditations to enlightening TED talks ------ FearTools was designed in collaboration with multiple mental health professionals. FearTools is free, contains no advertisements, and is a purely non-profit venture aimed at helping people suffering from clinical depression. Thank you for supporting our efforts with your positive ratings and reviews. Please send any requests, questions, or feedback via email to moodtools@moodtools.org and we will be sure to respond to each one. Disclaimer: This mental health application is not intended to be a replacement for treatment nor any sort of medical intervention. Treatment is, by far, the best way to overcome anxiety disorders. Psychotherapy and medications have been shown to effectively treat anxiety. This application will only aid you on your path to recovery from anxiety. If you are not being professionally treated for anxiety, please talk to your doctor or therapist or use this app to find resources that can connect you to treatment.

description: In 1 minute, find the cause of mood swings, intense emotional changes, low energy, and more. HOW DOES IT WORK? Look at the color ring & pick the color you are drawn to first. There are 7 colors left. Now choose the most pleasant of the remaining ones. Continue until you run out of colors. ACCURACY To get the most accurate result please select colors based on your preferences at this specific moment. Do not think too much, let your subconscious do the job. Do NOT associate colors with objects, — cars, clothes, buildings, etc. Just pick colors you like right at this moment. WHY DOES THIS WORK? Colors have surrounded mankind since the beginning of time and have influenced us for generations. In the beginning, human life was ruled by two uncontrollable factors: night and day. Light and darkness. For thousands of years man's actions, such as attack (red) or retreat (green) were embedded into our brains. The colors of nature have had their influence on us, and these influences are deep-rooted in our psyche. Colors and their subconscious meaning are there, whether we like it or not. That meaning is independent of race, language, education level, social status, etc. This app is the ultimate tool for understanding the inner self, mood fluctuation, productivity level, and more. FEATURES: • Anxiety, productivity & energy analysis • Harmony, Independence & openness levels • Daily check-in for mood, empathy, self union & more • Detailed mood description • Works on iPhone, iPad and Watch • Monthly summaries and charts • Auto syncs to all your devices • No registration, accounts or passwords • Zero ads SAFE AND SECURE: Privacy is not something you are merely entitled to, it is an absolute prerequisite. name: Toto: Anxiety & OCD Relief
description: STOP RUNNING FROM ANXIETY. START LIVING AGAIN. Toto teaches you to face anxiety head-on using Acceptance and Commitment Therapy (ACT) - one of the most effective, evidence-based approaches for anxiety and OCD recovery. Unlike other apps that teach relaxation or distraction, Toto helps you build real resilience by changing your relationship with anxiety itself. WHAT MAKES TOTO DIFFERENT Most anxiety apps teach you to calm down or avoid triggers. Toto does the opposite - it teaches you that the way OUT of anxiety is THROUGH it. Based on "Nothing Works" anxiety therapy principles, you'll learn that trying to control anxiety only makes it stronger. START FREE WITH 7 ESSENTIAL DAYS Get immediate access to the core program that covers the fundamentals: - Daily lessons on ACT principles and exposure therapy - Real-world examples showing how others face their fears - Gradual exposure exercises tailored to your triggers - Audio guidance for challenging moments - Evidence-based techniques used by therapists worldwide In just 7 days, you'll understand the principles that can transform your relationship with anxiety. CORE TOOLS INCLUDED Exposure Logging - Track your brave moments. Document what you faced, how you felt, and watch your progress over time. Mood Tracking - See patterns in your anxiety and celebrate improvements as you practice acceptance. Daily Journal - Process your experiences, thoughts, and breakthroughs in a private space. Audio Program - Listen to guided content about facing anxiety when reading isn't practical. UNLOCK MORE WITH PREMIUM Ready to go deeper? Premium unlocks: - 23 additional days of advanced content and exercises - AI Chat Support for personalized guidance and encouragement - Extended exposure challenges - Advanced ACT techniques WHO THIS APP IS FOR Toto is designed for people struggling with: - Generalized anxiety disorder - OCD and intrusive thoughts - Social anxiety - Panic attacks - Health anxiety - Perfectionism and control issues You don't need a formal diagnosis - if anxiety is limiting your life, Toto can help. THE SCIENCE BEHIND TOTO Acceptance and Commitment Therapy (ACT) is backed by decades of research. Instead of fighting anxiety, ACT teaches psychological flexibility - the ability to be present with discomfort while taking action toward what matters. Studies show that exposure therapy and acceptance-based approaches are more effective than avoidance strategies for long-term anxiety relief. START YOUR RECOVERY JOURNEY Breaking free from anxiety doesn't mean eliminating fear - it means no longer letting fear control you. With Toto, you'll learn to: - Stop avoiding situations that trigger anxiety - Welcome uncomfortable thoughts and feelings - Take action even when you feel afraid - Build confidence through repeated exposure - Live according to your values, not your fears Download Toto today and start your free 7-day program. Discover what's possible when you stop fighting anxiety and start living fully. MEDICAL DISCLAIMER This app provides educational information about anxiety management based on Acceptance and Commitment Therapy (ACT) and evidence-based research. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or qualified mental health provider before making any medical decisions or if you have questions about a medical condition. If you are in crisis, please contact emergency services or a mental health professional immediately. Scientific sources: Dr. Claire Weekes, Acceptance and Commitment Therapy (ACT), Exposure and Response Prevention (ERP), and Nothing Works philosophy. Mindfulness has been shown to be effective for reducing stress, improving emotional balance, increasing self-awareness, helping with anxiety and depression, and coping more effectively with chronic pain. Mindfulness Coach 2.0 was developed to help Veterans, Service members, and others learn how to practice mindfulness. The app provides a gradual, self-guided training program designed to help you understand and adopt a simple mindfulness practice. Mindfulness Coach also offers a library of information about mindfulness (for example “What is Mindfulness?”, “How to Anchor Your Attention”), 12 audio-guided mindfulness exercises and a growing catalog of additional exercises available for free download, goal-setting and tracking, a mindfulness mastery assessment to help you track your progress over time, customizable reminders, and access to other support and crisis resources. Mindfulness Coach is free, doesn’t take or share any of your personal information, and doesn’t require add-on purchases. Mindfulness Coach was created by VA’s National Center for PTSD.

name: Anxiety Test - Quick Test
description: Anxiety occurs when there is a perceived danger, whether the danger is real or only imagined. It comprises a measure of symptoms related to the emotional state of fear. Symptoms: ● fear, panic ● tremors (hands), unsteadiness (legs) ● dry mouth, difficulty breathing, increased heart rate, sweaty hands ● performance concerns ● worries about losing control ● low self-esteem ● imposing excessively high standards Monitor your mental state using our quick anxiety test. ● Anxiety Test offers a scientific method of self-diagnose, based on the DASS test https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DASS_(psychology) ● Make sure to seek a doctor’s advice in addition to using this app and before making any medical decisions.

name: At Ease Anxiety Relief
description: Relax quickly and stop the "Anxiety-Worry Spiral". A unique approach, the app features guided breathing meditations and guided journaling with topics to write on and think about during the day. At Ease is intended to make deep and lasting change rather than applying a temporary “band aid”. You can experience immediate relief using the guided breathing meditations, and realize long term benefits using the program regularly over time. "A Must Have! I have suffered with very bad anxiety for years and this app has been a wonderful help." --rallylou, app user At Ease includes: -- 3 Guided Breathing Meditations -- Guided Journaling program with exercises -- Option of voice alone or music or nature sounds for the background of the meditations -- 3 choices of Music -- 3 choices of Nature Sounds -- Ability to adjust relative volume of voice and background GUIDED BREATHING MEDITATIONS These meditations are the core of the At Ease program. When you are anxious, your breathing becomes shallow and constricted. You will learn to breathe in an easy, natural way that makes you feel more relaxed. The meditations will also train you to let go of worry and find the pleasure in breathing. At Ease contains three easy, effective breathing meditations: -- Deep Breathing Guided Meditation -- Breath Awareness Guided Meditation -- Belly Breathing Guided Meditation Your meditation sessions can be added to Apple Health. JOURNALING & EXERCISES The At Ease journaling process is increases self-awareness -- the foundation of all change. It will also help you develop some important strategies for dealing with anxiety. You will be given exercises to do during the day, and questions to write about as you reflect on your experiences with the exercises. ---------------------- "I am a very anxious, nervous person but thanks to you I am becoming relaxed and finally sleeping enough." -- Sophie "Mary Maddux is able to bring her listener to a state of calm and relaxation quickly and easily. Her voice and the music behind her is so soothing to a tired soul and bring you to a quiet level of relaxation." -- Kim "A couple times at work, I could feel panic attacks coming on so I went to a conference room and listened to one of the meditations... I was able to calm down significantly and get through the day. Pretty amazing!" -- SH "The words and music...work together in a synergistic way to create a feeling of comfort, peace, and reassurance that has been very effective for me in reducing the anxious thoughts and increasing the joy and well being." -- CP ---------------------- ABOUT MARY AND RICHARD MADDUX Meditation teachers Mary and Richard Maddux have brought meditation to thousands of people worldwide with their popular Meditation Oasis® podcast, CDs and smartphone apps. Mary’s guided meditations draw on her experience as counselor and healing arts practitioner in both conventional and alternative settings. The processes in the At Ease app are informed by her work in mental health, hospital and hospice. Richard has played and composed music all of his life. He teaches through his music which is composed for meditation, relaxation and healing and supports the meditative experience. DISCLAIMER: This application is not a substitute for professional counseling or medical advice.

description: Is anxiety making your life a lot harder than it needs to be? Do you find yourself worrying a lot, thinking the worst, catastrophizing about what might happen? The worst thing about anxiety is it's very difficult to think yourself out of it. Anxious feelings create anxious thoughts, which create anxious feelings and so on. It's a vicious circle with you at its center. But there is some good news. The free hypnosis session in the app - Overcome Fear & Anxiety - will relax you so wonderfully deeply that for a good while afterwards your anxiety levels will be much, much lower, if you have any anxiety at all. Then, repeated listening will calm your nervous system so profoundly that it will start to get much harder to get anxious, and when you start to feel that way a lot of the time, the anxiety problem will be well on its way to being sorted for good. With over 20 years experience, and more than 1/2 million hypnosis sessions sold, Uncommon Knowledge knows how to set your mind at rest. The app is super-simple, you just install it and hit play on the free session. You can use that for as long as you like, but if you want more variety at any time you can upgrade to the monthly paid option and access 10 more anxiety sessions. Our most popular anxiety session 'Overcome Fear & Anxiety' is free inside the app to reduce your anxiety right away. Then, if you like what you hear, you can unlock the other anxiety sessions with the monthly payment option. From Uncommon Knowledge, delivering hypnosis since 1998. # CONTENTS # # Free: • Overcome Fear & Anxiety # Paid: • Generalized Anxiety Treatment • Anticipatory Anxiety • Overcome Performance Anxiety • Shyness and Social Anxiety • Stop Panic Attacks • 7:11 Breathing Relaxation • Stop Thinking the Worst • Trust Yourself • Body Scan Relaxation • Spring Meadow Relaxation # Monthly: $4.99/month Overcome Anxiety Hypnosis Downloads offers an auto-renewing subscription option. name: Social Anxiety Test
description: Evaluate your risk of social anxiety disorder with a 24 question screening test. This app presents the Liebowitz Social Anxiety Scale, a validated screening questionnaire that aims to measure the severity of Social Anxiety Disorder (SAD), also known as Social Phobia. The LSAS-SR is a 24 question self-rating scale which covers fear, avoidance, and physical signs of social anxiety. This application is designed so that you can take the test every week and track your test scores over time. Disclaimer: This questionnaire cannot indicate a diagnosis of social anxiety disorder. Only a qualified professional can make this diagnosis. Please consult a physician if you are concerned about social anxiety disorder.

name: Heal EMDR: Self-Guided Therapy
developer: HEAL APP FOR INTERNET CONTENT PROVIDER
description: Heal EMDR puts clinically proven Eye Movement Desensitization and Reprocessing (EMDR) therapy in your pocket, so you can reduce PTSD, trauma, anxiety, depression and more, anytime, anywhere. Backed by research and trusted by the WHO, APA, U.S. Department of Veterans Affairs, SAMHSA and the UK’s NICE, EMDR has helped millions process distressing memories and reclaim their lives. Heal brings the same evidence-based method to you in simple, guided steps. Key Features - Optional AI Therapist or Standard Questionnaire: choose how you want to be guided - Targeted programs: Beat Anxiety, Conquer PTSD, Heal Trauma, Lift Depression, Cope With Grief, Ease Phobias - Personalized sessions: adjust tone speed, therapist voice, session length and set count - Progress dashboard: watch your disturbance level drop, earn streaks and track total therapy time - Resource library: videos, tips and articles to deepen your understanding of EMDR - 100% private: all data stays on your device; nothing is shared or sold Why EMDR With Heal - Faster relief than many talk-therapy methods - No need to relive every detail of traumatic events - Proven to reduce anxiety, depression and negative self-beliefs - Affordable, unlimited access - costs less than a single in-person session - Start immediately; no waiting lists Subscription Plans - Monthly plan: free trial included - 3-month plan: free trial included Disclaimer: The Heal app provides self-guided therapy tools and should not be used as a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health providers with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition. Never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of something you have read on this app. Start feeling better today! Download Heal EMDR and take the first step toward lasting mental wellness. Privacy Policy: https://www.healemdr.com/privacy Terms and Conditions: https://www.healemdr.com/terms

name: The Mighty
description: We don’t just talk about health, we live it. From mental health to chronic illness, disability, rare disease, parenting, neurodiversity, caregiving, and so much more, you’ll find the resources you need and the peer support you want on The Mighty, the world’s largest online health community. Health is hard, but it never has to be lonely. - Read stories written by people with first-hand health experience, and discover resources curated specifically for the conditions you care about: ADHD, autism, bipolar disorder, suicide, chronic pain, anxiety, depression, and so much more - Create a profile that allows you to keep track of your healthcare interests and community connections, and save the resources and posts that matter to you - Start or end your day — or take a midday break! — with a fresh affirmation that changes based on what emotion you’re feeling - Follow and search posts, stories, people, and topics to find the health content you want from 700+ health communities and support groups - Join a Mighty group and connect with like-minded people around health, hobbies, and similar interests - Make a post when you have something to share; or when you need advice, support, or encouragement from people who get it - Scroll through your personalized home feed, based on the groups you're a part of and the people and topics you follow - Ask and answer polls — the perfect, bite-sized way to engage on low-energy days, or during flares and depressive episodes We're always looking for ways to improve The Mighty for our community. If you have any feedback about The Mighty app — good, bad or anything in between — please share it with us by emailing community@themighty.com. We’re here for you, and we are #MightyTogether! The Mighty Team

name: Grow Therapy
description: Welcome to Grow Therapy – mental health care that’s easy to start, covered by insurance, and flexible enough to grow with your life. Whether you're working through anxiety, stress, burnout, relationships, or life’s ups and downs, Grow helps you find the right provider, book quickly, and stay supported before, during, and after your sessions. With over 1 million clients served and 3 million+ sessions delivered, Grow has built trust the old-fashioned way – one session at a time. Now with the Grow Therapy app, your care can move with you. Because life doesn’t pause between sessions, and now, neither does your care. The support you need. The way you need it. * Therapy that fits your schedule: Evenings, weekends, no waitlists * Thousands of therapists who get you: Search by identity, specialty, language, and more * Covered by insurance: 100+ plans accepted—some sessions cost as little as $0 * Clear cost estimates: No subscriptions. No hidden fees * All-in-one care: Therapy and medication support in one place Say hello to coach At the heart of the Grow app is coach, a conversational AI tool built specifically to support your mental health between sessions. With more than one-third* of Americans already comfortable using AI for mental health support, we wanted to build an alternative that keeps a clinician’s expertise and training front and center. Most AI tools aren’t designed for therapy and they don’t integrate with your provider. We built coach to be different. Grow’s coach is an AI-powered, guided support tool built with clinical input, privacy, and safety at its core. It’s designed to help you reflect, build on your sessions, and keep growing between visits. Grow’s coach is fine-tuned to complement your care, not replace it, working in alignment with your provider and care plan, never independently. Do the work with your therapist. Practice it between sessions with coach. The Grow App: Stay connected and supported—anytime, anywhere. Book and join sessions, message your provider, and grow between visits with guided support, reflection, and practice from coach. Here’s what you can do in the app: * Book and join sessions in one tap * Message your provider anytime, securely * Use pre-session check-ins and post-session tools to stay on track * Get guided support between sessions with coach * Access handouts, worksheets, and therapy tools * Track your progress with session insights and reminders * Manage therapy and medication in one place The Grow app brings therapy into real life. Whether you’re prepping for a session, navigating a tough moment, or reflecting on progress, your care stays with you, wherever you are. Feeling better starts easier at Grow. Download Grow Therapy and take the first step. Note: coach is available to eligible clients in select U.S. states. Grow’s coach is AI-powered and designed to support you between sessions. It doesn't replace therapy, isn't monitored in real time, and isn't a crisis tool. Grow’s coach is not a replacement for any medical diagnosis or treatments; likewise, it cannot, and does not intend to, provide medical advice or diagnosis. If you’re in a crisis or emergency, call 988 or 911. CONNECT WITH US! We’re always happy to hear from you! Check out our website: growtherapy.com Follow us on TikTok: tiktok.com/@growtherapy Follow us on Instagram: instagram.com/growtherapy Like us on Facebook: facebook.com/joingrowtherapy * Bansal, Bhavika. “Can an AI Chatbot Be Your Therapist? A Third of Americans Are Comfortable With the Idea.” YouGov, May 17, 2024.

name: SimplePractice Client Portal
description: If you’re receiving services for behavioral health, counseling, speech pathology, occupational therapy, physical therapy, or any other wellness service by a practitioner who uses SimplePractice, this app is for you! The SimplePractice Client Portal iOS app empowers you to manage care for you or your loved ones from one secure place. Stay connected with your practitioner between appointments from the convenience of your phone. Your personal information is kept private, yet easily accessible for your convenience. Simplify how you access care with features like: • Passwordless login – Securely log into your Client Portal without the hassle of a username or password by setting up a passcode, touch ID, or Face ID for instant access. • Personalized notifications – Get push notifications sent right to your phone regarding any new messages, invoices, or documents that have been sent to you by your practitioner. • Secure messaging – Message your practitioner directly from your phone knowing that all communication is secure and private. • Upcoming appointments and requests – View all your upcoming appointments, and request a new appointment with your practitioner directly from the app. • Digital payments – Add new payment methods to pay your bills including HSA and FSA cards. You can even pay directly from the app. • Digital paperwork – Complete documents and questionnaires related to care on your own time. • Telehealth – Join virtual appointments with your practitioner directly from the app, so you never have to find a link buried in your inbox again. • Appointment directions – Get automatically transferred to your preferred mobile navigation app for easy directions to your practitioner’s office. • Profile switching – Quickly toggle between any Client Portal you’re managing—whether you’re seeing different providers who use SimplePractice for practice management or are managing care for multiple individuals. To access the SimplePractice Client Portal iOS app, you must be invited to use the SimplePractice Client Portal by your practitioner. When you first log into the app, the email you provided to your practitioner will be used to authenticate your Client Portal access. After you’ve signed up, turn on Face ID, Touch ID, or a four-digit passcode for hassle-free login. Please note: what you can see and do within the SimplePractice Client Portal app may vary, and is limited to the specific features your practitioner has enabled for your profile. Are you currently looking for therapy services? To find a behavioral health therapist that uses SimplePractice near you, visit www.meetmonarch.com.

name: ReGain - Couples Therapy
description: Get support for your relationship from a licensed therapist specializing in relationship therapy. Connect with a therapist on your own terms - individually or alongside your partner. ------------------------------------------- REGAIN – FEATURES ------------------------------------------- • Get therapy on your own or with your partner • All therapists are licensed, trained, accredited and highly experienced in providing relationship support • Complete a short survey to be matched with a therapist who best fits your needs • Unlimited private communication with your therapist • Schedule live sessions with your therapist or use the secure messenger PROFESSIONAL HELP, PERSONALIZED FOR YOU Relationship problems can be painful and challenging. Support and guidance from a professional therapist has been shown to make big, positive changes. We created Regain so anyone can have convenient, discreet, and affordable access to professional help. Common relationship problems people seek help for are difficulty communicating, high levels of conflict, disagreement over finances, children, or in-laws, and problems with infidelity, to name just a few. LICENSED AND TRAINED THERAPISTS All therapists on Regain have at least 3 years and 1,000 hours of hands-on experience. They are licensed, trained, experienced and accredited psychologists (PhD/PsyD), marriage and family therapists (MFT), clinical social workers (LCSW), licensed professional counselors (LPC), or similar credentials. All of our therapists have a Master’s Degree or a Doctorate Degree in their respective fields. They have been qualified and certified by their state professional board and have completed the necessary education, exams, training and practice. HOW DOES IT WORK? After filling out our questionnaire, you will be matched with a licensed therapist based on your needs and preferences. You and your therapist will get your own secure and private “therapy room” where you can message your therapist at any time, from any internet-connected device, wherever you are. Your partner will be invited to this room as well if you decide to try therapy together. You can also schedule a session so speak live with your therapist over video or phone. You can write or talk about yourself, the things going on in your life, ask questions and discuss the challenges you’re facing and your therapist will provide feedback, insights and guidance. This ongoing dialogue is the foundation of your work with your therapist. If you choose to try therapy on ReGain with your partner (either at the start of therapy, or if you choose to invite them later), your dialogue would be between all three of you: you, your partner, and your therapist. Together you will work towards making a positive change in your relationship and accomplishing your goals. HOW MUCH DOES IT COST? The cost of therapy through Regain ranges from $60 to $90 per week (billed every 4 weeks) but may be higher based on your location, preferences, and therapist availability. Unlike traditional in-office therapy which can cost over $150 for a single session, your Regain membership includes unlimited text, video, audio messaging as well as weekly live sessions. The subscription is billed and renewed every 4 weeks and includes both the use of the secured site and the counseling service itself. You can cancel your membership at any time for any reason.

name: Teen Counseling
description: Teen Counseling lets you connect with a licensed therapist who specializes in helping teens like you. Whenever you need and wherever you are, just text your therapist or schedule a video or phone call. Your therapist is here to help you thrive! HOW DO I START? Invite your parent(s) to sign up. They fill out a consent form for you (required by law) Once your parent subscribes, you will be matched with a licensed therapist and invited to your own therapy room Your therapist will communicate with you on the Teen Counseling app using text, phone, and video WHY DO I NEED PARENTAL CONSENT? As required by law, a parent or legal guardian must fill out a consent form before you can receive online therapy services. HOW DOES THERAPY WORK? You and your therapist will get your own “room.”This will be your place to communicate with your therapist day or night. You can access this room from any internet connected device, wherever you are. You can write about yourself, the things going on in your life, ask questions and discuss the challenges you’re facing. Your therapist will login to the same room and respond with feedback, insights and guidance. Together you’ll work towards making a positive change in your life, accomplishing your goals and overcoming your troubles. IS WHAT I SHARE WITH MY THERAPIST PRIVATE? Your parent will not have access to this room. You can talk to your therapist about anything, but there are a few things that they would be required to share with either your parents or other adults. If you share any of the following issues with your therapist, they would have to break confidentiality for your protection or the protection of others: • If you are seriously contemplating severely harming yourself or someone else. • If you share with your therapist that you are being abused or neglected, or know of another individual under 18 who is being abused or neglected. • If you share with your therapist that you know of an elderly person who is being abused or neglected. Please consult with your therapist about what kind of information and updates your parent(s) may get regarding your work with your therapist. WHO ARE THE THERAPISTS? We require every Therapist providing services on the Platform to be an accredited, trained, and experienced licensed U.S. psychologist (PhD / PsyD), licensed marriage and family therapist (LMFT), licensed clinical social worker (LCSW), licensed professional counselor (LPC), or similar applicable recognized professional certification based on their state and/or jurisdiction. Therapists must have a relevant academic degree in their field, at least 3 years of experience and at least 1,000 hours of hands-on experience.

name: Mindly Therapy
description: FIND A THERAPIST WHO IS RIGHT FOR YOU In order to choose the specialists who are ideal for you, we suggest that you first fill out a short questionnaire, where you will be able to outline your expectations. Your answers will become the basis for the formation of individual recommendations. We pay attention to every wish when selecting highly qualified specialists for each Mindly client. ALL THERAPISTS HAVE A DEGREE IN PSYCHOLOGY AND VIDEO PROFILES Before signing up for a session, you have the opportunity to view the specialist's video presentation, his certifications and learn about the specifics of his or her therapy. In addition, you can contact a specialist via chat to clarify any questions that may arise during the selection process. CHOOSE ANY TIME THAT WORKS FOR YOU At Mindly, we understand that waiting weeks or months for a therapy session is no longer relevant. In today's on-demand world, mental health should not be an exception. That's why with Mindly you have the opportunity to book a therapy session and get a consultation from a psychologist today, no more waiting! RESCHEDULE AND CANCEL SESSIONS AS NEEDED You are free to cancel or reschedule your session as many times as you need, but this must be done at least 24 hours before the scheduled time. If some unforeseen circumstances arose and you were unable to do so within the specified period, you always have the opportunity to discuss rescheduling the session directly with your psychologist. HOLD SESSIONS ONLINE FROM ANY DEVICE We have our own video calling system integrated into the Mindly platform, so you can join a session through our mobile app or through a browser on your computer. All video calls are guaranteed to be secure and confidential. CHAT WITH YOUR THERAPIST AT YOUR CONVENIENCE Mindly has an integrated chat that allows you to ask any of our experts questions and get answers quickly. Understanding the complexity of choosing a therapist, we offer the ability to communicate directly with all of our therapists via chat. This gives you the opportunity to get all the information you need directly from the professionals you are considering working with, helping you feel more confident in your choice. WITH SUBSCRIPTIONS YOU WON’T MISS A SINGLE SESSION Mindly has implemented a therapy subscription system that not only allows you to save money, but also allows you to buy sessions in packages. The more sessions you choose, the less each session costs. We would like to emphasize that regularity and systematicity in the therapeutic process significantly increase the effectiveness of therapy. After all, working deeply with your problems takes time and commitment, and it is the subscription that helps ensure this consistency and stability, which is key to achieving positive change. Our subscription is designed so that you can always pause or cancel it, giving you flexibility and control over the process and your costs CUSTOMER CARE SERVICE Customer focus comes first at Mindly. Regardless of your request - be it technical assistance, financial questions, or advice on choosing your first specialist - our support team is always here to help. We will do our best to assist you with any query you may have.

name: NOCD: OCD Therapy and Tools
description: NOCD offers online OCD therapy and in-between session support, right in the NOCD platform. Get matched with a licensed OCD therapist in your state and do live, face-to-face video sessions with a therapist trained in exposure and response prevention (ERP) therapy, the gold standard treatment for OCD. NOCD was created by people with OCD, along with some of the world's top experts. Online therapy sessions with an OCD specialist: - Match with an OCD therapist who fits your preferences - Personalize your OCD treatment plan - Do live video sessions with a therapist who specializes in exposure and response prevention (ERP) therapy, the gold standard treatment for OCD Additional support between sessions: - Use OCD therapy tools 24/7 - Message your therapist anytime - Interact with a community who knows what you’re going through - Dozens of weekly support groups with others in NOCD Therapy WHAT IS OBSESSIVE COMPULSIVE DISORDER (OCD)? OCD is a common psychiatric disorder that involves repetitive, unwanted thoughts that cause anxiety, and compulsive behaviors done in an attempt to reduce this anxiety. Commonly misunderstood as nothing more than a personality quirk, OCD usually involves intense distress and can become completely debilitating when left untreated. IS NOCD THERAPY EFFECTIVE? NOCD live video therapy has been shown to be as effective as face-to-face therapy. Our model has been backed by research from the Columbia University Medical Center, which found a reduction in OCD severity by an average of 40% in 8 weeks of NOCD Therapy. WHO ARE NOCD THERAPISTS? NOCD’s extensive therapist network includes licensed counselors, psychologists, and social workers. Every NOCD Therapist receives specialty training in exposure and response prevention (ERP) therapy, the most effective OCD treatment. All NOCD therapists are managed by our clinical leadership team of experts who have 20+ years of experience treating OCD and have designed some of the world’s top OCD treatment programs. IS NOCD SECURE? Our services are powered by AWS and Aptible, both of which are fully SOC2 and HIPAA compliant. Your therapy data is stored in our EHR that also complies with all HIPAA requirements. All medical notes and records are only accessible by you and your therapist. Furthermore, in addition to internal privacy safeguards, we regularly enlist security researchers to assess our services for vulnerabilities. For more information, find our complete Privacy Policy at https://www.treatmyocd.com/privacy-policy/, and Terms of Use at https://www.treatmyocd.com/terms/ Download the NOCD app today and schedule a free phone call with our care team to learn how we can help you regain your life from OCD.

name: HelloMind - Hypnosis & Therapy
description: HelloMind helps you battle problems like stress, bad sleep, weight gain and low self-esteem. Choose a treatment, then relax and listen to the sessions. HelloMind helps you take back control from negative emotions, cravings, fears and bad habits and it can improve your motivation and enjoyment of life. Try the Sleep Boosters: - Have a good night’s sleep - Sleep more peacefully Or boost your confidence with the sessions: - Have more confidence - Improve your self-worth - Become self-confident Or kick that anxiety for good with sessions like: - Be more calm - Get rid of your fear of panicking - My ability to de-stress Or get rid of your phobia eg.: - Spiders - Dentists - Enclosed spaces MORE Low self-esteem, stress, fear, bad sleep and unhealthy habits sometimes hold us back in life and prevent us from enjoying things to the fullest. The good news is these negative patterns can be broken or eliminated. We created the HelloMind app to help you make a change. We want you to be able to think better and feel stronger. Anywhere, any time without having to spend a lot of time and money on treatment. The key to happiness lies within you. And HelloMind works because you are making the change yourself. Choose a treatment with 10 sessions if you want help to remove or change something like a craving, a habit or a fear. Each session takes about 30 minutes, and your series of 10 sessions should be completed within about 30 days. Choose a Booster if you’d like to reinforce good emotions boost motivation or strengthen a certain area of yourself. HelloMind uses a method called RDH - Result Driven Hypnosis, a form of guided hypnosis. RDH is especially effective because it helps you go to the root cause of your problem. The theory behind it says that when you’re consciously able to define the problem, your subconscious can find the solution. That’s why you’re gently guided into your subconscious towards the root of your problem then given the tool to fix it. The ten sessions in a treatment or the sessions in a Booster are variations on the same theme, so you’ll hear something different every time you listen. But listening to all 10 sessions in treatment is the only way to ensure that you go deep enough into your subconscious to discover the root of the problem. Every time you listen, you’ll feel a little more safe, because the process is underway and you’ve become accustomed to it. That’s why you relax more as the hypnosis stages become more profound. When choosing a hypnotherapy treatment, you should always begin with your main problem. The app will guide you to the right treatment or Booster with simple questions. Choosing the right treatment is actually an important part of the process. When you can consciously define the problem, your subconscious will know the solution. HelloMind integrates with the Apple Health app counting mindfullness minutes. RECENT AWARDS & RECOGNITIONS ** Finalist (Mental Health category) ** — UCSF Digital Health awards 2019 ** Finalist (Consumer Wellness & Prevention category) ** — UCSF Digital Health awards 2019 PRICING HelloMind offers 3 auto-renewal subscription periods: 2 Family subscriptions and 1 single subscription. - Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase - Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period - Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period - Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable - You can cancel your subscription via this url: https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT202039 - Privacy policy and Terms of use: http://hellomind.com/legal/

name: Depression Test
description: The Depression Test is a powerful tool to evaluate depression and monitor treatment response.The test questions are based on Patient Healthcare Questionnaire-9 (PHQ-9), the most widely used and trusted questionnaire among mental health professionals. The test can be self-administered. With Depression Test, you can: - take the PHQ-9 test to screen for depression - check the severity of your depression - store the test results and monitor improvements over time - keep a journal to track your mood - educate yourself with short, informative articles on Depression - feel better by using self-guided Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) to identify and reframe your negative thoughts - gain access to high quality depression resources The CBT exercises include A-B-C, Socratic Questions, Challenge Core Beliefs, and De-catastrophizing. The exercises will help you identify and challenge your cognitive distortions that lead to negative thoughts. Depression can be effectively treated. Don't wait until things get worse. Find out if you're depressed and then take action. Disclaimer: This self-test should not be used as a replacement for professional treatment or guidance. You should consult a medical professional if you are concerned about your symptoms.

name: Constant Therapy: Brain+Speech
description: Constant Therapy is an award-winning, science-based cognitive, language, and speech therapy app designed to help people recovering from stroke, traumatic brain injury (TBI), aphasia, apraxia, dementia, or other neurological conditions. Join a community of 800,000+ users, completing 325 million+ evidence-based therapy activities using Constant Therapy. Get unlimited AI-guided therapy that allows you to engage in therapy exercises when and where you want. We support users seeking structured aphasia therapy or cognitive therapy that they can access anytime. AVAILABLE IN English dialects (US, UK, Australia, India) & US Spanish. Constant Therapy is designed to address concerns such as: – I know what I want to say but can’t find the words due to aphasia – My family can’t understand me when I talk – Before my TBI, I was a math whiz. Now, I have trouble with everyday math – I am forgetful, and I need help improving my memory – Staying on task has been difficult for me since my stroke. I need to fine-tune my attention & executive functioning – My loved one is getting speech therapy once a month, but it’s not enough. They need daily therapy – I need more aphasia, speech, or cognitive treatment exercises between therapy sessions FEATURES & BENEFITS • Recovering from stroke, TBI, aphasia, apraxia, dementia, or other neurological conditions? Choose your speech and cognitive therapy goals, and the app delivers customized & ever-adjusting exercises based on your unique needs • Tackle memory challenges, enhance communication skills, & regain everyday abilities through your individualized program • Engage in speaking, memory, attention, reading, writing, language, math, comprehension, problem solving, visual processing, auditory memory, & many other essential skill-building exercises • Work independently at home, pair the app with in-clinic therapy, or add your clinician so they can monitor your progress • Ideal for users looking to supplement aphasia therapy, speech therapy, and/or cognitive therapy with daily home-based exercises • Enjoy our friendly, live, Customer Support – trained to work with people with cognitive & communication challenges • Monitor your progress with real-time, easy-to-understand performance reports • Improve your chances for positive results: research has shown that patients using Constant Therapy get 5x more therapy practice, show faster improvement, & better outcomes*** • Access the world’s most comprehensive library of evidence-based exercises: 1 Million+ exercises across 90+ therapy areas • Try before you subscribe with a free 14-day trial ***SCIENCE BEHIND CONSTANT THERAPY Constant Therapy sets the gold standard with over 70 studies validating the clinical evidence behind our speech, language, and cognitive therapy exercises. We are also backed by 19 peer-reviewed research studies which substantiate the efficacy of Constant Therapy. See the list of clinical studies & research at: constanttherapyhealth.com/science/ Constant Therapy is much more than a brain-training app or brain games. It was designed by clinicians & scientists at Boston University specifically to target the challenges of recovery after stroke, brain injury, TBI, aphasia, dementia, apraxia, & other neurological disorders. It systematically tracks patient progress across a variety of functional domains. A multiple-award winner from Hearst Health, UCSF Health Hub, the American Stroke Association & AARP, Constant Therapy is recommended by thousands of speech-language pathologists, neurologists, occupational therapists, & clinicians at hospitals, clinics & rehabilitation facilities. SIGN UP FOR A FREE 14-DAY TRIAL CONTACT US support@constanttherapy.com constanttherapy.com TERMS constanttherapy.com/privacy/ constanttherapy.com/eula/ Constant Therapy does not provide rehabilitation services or guarantee improvements in brain function. It provides tools for self-help and tools for patients to work with their clinicians.

description: Tired of stress and anxiety? Welcome to Manifest, your personal companion for motivation and mental wellness. It’s a safe space to unpack your thoughts, process difficult emotions like stress and anger, and find a moment of calm. Think of it as a supportive friend, available whenever you need it. Use our Mood Tracker to understand your emotional patterns. Unwind with our Guided Journal, which offers mindful prompts to help you reflect and find clarity before you sleep. DAILY MOTIVATION & POSITIVITY Get your daily dose of inspiration with personalized affirmations, positive reminders, and motivational quotes. Whether your goal is to practice gratitude, build self-love, or stay focused, our tools are designed to help you overcome self-doubt and create a positive daily routine. TRACK YOUR GOALS & HABITS True change comes from small, consistent actions. Our integrated goal and habit tracker makes it easy and fun. Set your personal wellness goals—from journaling every day to practicing mindfulness—track your progress, and get the support you need to stay consistent and celebrate your wins. A Day with Manifest: Imagine waking up not with dread, but with a personalized, positive affirmation that sets the tone for your day. Feeling a wave of anxiety at lunch? Open a 5-minute chat session to recenter yourself. Before bed, spend a few moments with a mindful journal prompt to calm your mind and prepare for a restful sleep. That is the power of having a companion dedicated to your well-being. Disclaimer Manifest offers supportive conversations, mental health motivation, and therapy alternatives, but it is not a substitute for professional therapy or medical care. name: Unstuck: CBT Therapy Journal
description: Take charge of your mental health. Overcome anxiety and depression with CBT journaling. Backed by science, enhanced with AI. 81% of people with moderate to severe anxiety see an improvement after just one month of using Unstuck. By processing your thoughts and experiences with a guided CBT journal, you’ll develop the skills to take control of your mental health. Unstuck is based on cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT), the gold standard treatment in psychotherapy. The techniques we use are backed by science, so expect results. CBT is effective, not just for anxiety and depression, but also for stress, anger, trauma (PTSD), OCD, ADHD, and BPD. JOURNALING Unstuck includes multiple journals that work in unison to improve mental health. Thought Journal: Understand and train your brain to overcome unhelpful thinking patterns. 80% of people with distress see an instant improvement after completing an entry. Savoring Journal: Find joy and gratitude in daily life. 74% of people with anxiety see an immediate positive impact after completing an entry. Exposure Journal: Fight your fears by facing them with exposure therapy. This extremely powerful method for overcoming anxiety is out now. Unstuck utilizes inhibitory retrieval, the most effective exposure therapy approach based on the latest research (Craske et al., 2022). Mood Tracker: Understand the day to day impact of people, places, and activities on your mood with the Check-in journal. DISCOVER INSIGHTS Unstuck will deliver personalized insights so you can understand how your thought patterns change over time. Discover which thinking traps you’ve overcome and which you’re still falling into. See how events in your life are tied to changing levels of anxiety and depression. Draw meaningful connections to accelerate your mental health improvement. AI SECOND OPINION Not just a chatbot that spoon-feeds responses, your AI partner will strengthen your Thought Journal by conducting an objective analysis, uncovering thinking traps, and offering a fresh perspective. AI FEAR FINDER Get AI assistance with exposure therapy. AI Fear Finder helps identify your underlying fears, so they can be effectively targeted with the Exposure Journal. DARK MODE Whether you love the soothing vibe of dark hues or want to ease the strain on your eyes during late-night journaling, Unstuck has you covered. Choose from Dark Mode, Light Mode, or sync with your device settings for a seamless experience. ACCESS ON ALL YOUR DEVICES Get the support you need on the go with our mobile app. Or, if you prefer typing on a keyboard, use our website to access Unstuck from your desktop computer. KEEP YOUR DATA SAFE Create an optional account and Unstuck will automatically keep your data backed up and synced. Or, create local backups with the data export feature. TRY FOR FREE Try Unstuck with a free trial. After that, we offer monthly and yearly subscriptions. If you are facing financial hardship, apply for a free plan in the app. We believe Unstuck should be accessible to everyone and do not want to turn anyone away for lack of funds. We always love hearing your feedback — send it to us in the app or by emailing us at feedback@becomeunstuck.app. Insights provided by Unstuck do not constitute medical advice. Always check with your doctor before making medical decisions.

name: IFS Guide
description: Internal Family Systems (IFS Therapy) is the fastest growing therapy model because of it’s root-cause effectiveness. And our goal is to make it affordable and accessible for all! The IFS Guide app gives you step-by-step guidance based on Internal Family Systems protocols so that you have a safe space to take care of your Parts anytime, anywhere. Our AI-powered IFS Practitioner, called Sunny, acts like a real IFS practitioner and enables you to speak directly or chat with it anytime, anywhere, and in ANY LANGUAGE. Sunny will be with you every step of the way, so you never wander off or feel lost in the process. There are text, audio, and direct speaking guides in your native language that will help you through inner child work and shadow work, so you understand your parts better and create deeper relationships with them. In addition to AI-powered guidance, the app also provides smart guided meditations in audio, for those who prefer no AI included in their guidance. The feature to chat with your parts on your own, allows you the freedom and creativity you need to connect with your different sides (parts) at your own pace. You can also log your conversations with your parts and reflect on them later. Create a profile for each Part of your Internal Family System and log its traits, behavior, and relationships with other parts. Schedule reminders to ensure your Parts get the care and attention they need from you. IFS GUIDE APP FEATURES AI-Powered Guidance: AI-powered Sunny, acting like a real IFS practitioner, helps you navigate through your sessions. The ability to text or talk to Sunny, just like a real IFS session. Ability to chat or talk in your own words and language. Step-by-step Internal Family Systems guidance designed by Certified Level-3 IFS Practitioners: Understand your Parts better and create deeper relationships with them. "On-Call" assistance will help you stay in your process and not wander off. Chat with Your Parts On Your Own: Create a safe space to stay present and communicate with your parts at your own pace. Log your conversations and reflect on them at a later time. Chat with multiple parts at the same time. Get Help to Unblend: Never Lose Track of Your Parts: Add notes about what you have learned from them and their relationships with each other. Journal your healing process. Access your previous conversations and talk with your parts quickly and easily. Create profiles for each Part. Create parts maps on your own, or Sunny will do it for you automatically after each session. Stay Focused on Your Inner World: Get through each step smoothly and confidently without getting lost in the process. Gentle and soothing audio guidance helps reduce anxiety and overwhelm. Stay focused on your parts without having to worry about the next steps. Strengthen Your Relationship with Your Parts: Set reminders to check in with your parts regularly and explore different topics. Give your parts the care and attention they need. name: EMDR Therapy - PRO
description: This application uses many advanced digital technics and simulates EMDR therapy. EMDR is a technique recommended by psychotherapists and Psychologists. Eye Movement Desensitization and Reprocessing (EMDR) therapy is an extensively researched psychotherapy method proven to be effective and help people recover from trauma and other distressing life experiences which are including depression, PTSD, panic disorders, anxiety. The American Psychiatric Association, the American Psychological Association, the International Society for Traumatic Stress Studies, National Alliance on Mental Illness, the Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration, the U.K. National Institute for Health and Care Excellence, the U.S. Dept. of Veterans Affairs/Dept. of Defense, The Cochrane Database of Systematic Reviews, and the World Health Organization among many other national and international organizations recognize and recommend EMDR therapy as an effective treatment. First, put on your headphones, think of a traumatic and disturbing event. Follow the ball in the EMDR tool, focus on the transition of sounds in your left and right ears, and feel the vibrations. Thus, the effect of traumatic disturbing events that will provide the data flow between the right and left brain as in REM sleep will decrease. Focus on the trauma memory while simultaneously experiencing bilateral stimulation (typically eye movements), which is associated with a reduction in the vividness and emotion associated with the trauma memories. While you bring the details of that memory to mind, This tool will guide you through a series of side-to-side eye movements, auditory (with direction), and vibrations. As you learn to process the memory and related feelings it brings up, you’ll gradually be able to reframe that memory in a more positive light. Use three types of BLS: visual, auditory (with direction), and vibrations and modify your settings to suit your preferences. Eye movement desensitization and reprocessing (EMDR) is a form of psychotherapy developed by Francine Shapiro in the 1980s that was originally designed to alleviate the distress associated with traumatic memories such as post traumatic stress disorder (PTSD). In EMDR, the person being treated recalls distressing experiences whilst doing bilateral stimulation, such as side-to-side eye movement or physical stimulation, such as tapping either side of the body. According to the theory behind the approach, traumatic and painful memories can cause post-traumatic stress when you don’t process them completely. Then, when sights, sounds, words, or smells trigger those unprocessed memories, you re-experience them. The 2013 World Health Organization (WHO) practice guideline states that EMDR "is based on the idea that negative thoughts, feelings, and behaviors are the result of unprocessed memories. The treatment involves standardized procedures that include focusing simultaneously on spontaneous associations of traumatic images, thoughts, emotions and bodily sensations and bilateral stimulation that is most commonly in the form of repeated eye movements. This re-experiencing leads to the emotional distress and other symptoms recognized as post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD). EMDR aims to reduce symptoms of trauma by changing how your memories are stored in your brain. In a nutshell, an EMDR therapist does this by leading you through a series of bilateral (side-to-side) eye movements as you recall traumatic or triggering experiences in small segments, until those memories no longer cause distress.

WHO ARE THE COUNSELORS? There are hundreds of counselors in the Christian Therapist on Demand network. All of our counselors are trained, licensed, experienced, and accredited counselors that have Master’s degrees or Doctorate degree in their field. HOW DOES IT WORK? The team behind the free chat therapy app will match you to an available counselor who fits your preferences and the type of issues you are dealing with. You and your therapist will get a “chat room” which will be open 24/7 and it will be a secure place to communicate. Where you and your therapist can exchange text, audio and video messages. You can enter it any time where you will write about yourself and about the things going on in your life. You can ask questions and discuss the issues of your life that trouble you. Your therapist will log in to the room and after reading your messages, he/she will respond to your issues, give you feedback and guidance. You and your therapist will schedule live messaging sessions and live calls. During Couple’s Coaching you can Invite your partner into the session right away or work on yourself with the counselor one on one with the goal of including your partner after a few sessions. It's up tp you. Live Group classes are available, covering multiple topics, including anxiety, depression, grief, connect with other Believers and find support. Certificates of completion are available for certain groups. HOW MUCH DOES IT COST? We developed Christian Therapist on Demand to be affordable with counseling plans ranging from $65 to $80 per week for individual counseling and $95 per week for couple’s coaching (plans are billed monthly). Unlike traditional therapy that costs upwards of $150+ per session, Christian Therapist On Demand’s all inclusive plans include unlimited text, audio and video messaging, live group classes, and live video calls. Christian Therapist On Demand is risk-free, easily accessible therapy for everyone. There is a free trial to get you started. Download the app and get started today! Lastly, you can simply cancel your subscription at anytime for any reason. Cancellation of your subscription is very easy and done through the platform – there are no hoops to jump through. WEEPING MAY ENDURE FOR A NIGHT BUT JOY COMES IN THE MORNING - Psalms 30.5. YOUR MORNING IS NOW! DOWNLOAD THE APP TODAY AND GET STARTED.

We focus on building consistent routines that fit into your daily life and help you make gradual, meaningful shifts over time. ■ CHANGE BEGINS WITH SLEEP Many scientific studies show that sleep is one of the most effective foundations for personal change, which is why we’ve made it a core part of Mo’s approach. Our sleep courses, audiobooks, and bedtime stories are voiced by expert narrators and are designed to restore the inner calm you need to break unhealthy habits. With better sleep, your stress hormones decrease, your immune system strengthens, and your ability to stay focused significantly improves, even when things get tough. ■ PROGRAMS FOR RECOVERY Our library contains more than 400 sessions and is continually expanding — whatever your goal, you’ll always be able to find a guide that works for you. name: Meditation Time 2.0
description: The ‘Meditation Time App’ provides you with a very useful tool to make your meditation even more mindful: Set the timer and let one of the many singing bowls and instruments remind you of the end of your meditation after the desired time. If you wish, you can also set a mindfulness chime at any interval to gently bring you back to meditation if your thoughts do wander. Pleasant nature sounds as switchable background sounds help you meditate when your mind (or your environment) is particularly restless. Our guided meditations by professional speakers provide you with additional guidance and motivation for your daily meditation practice. The ‘teaching’ provides a brief and undogmatic overview of the most important aspects of meditation practice and offers you inspiration and motivation for your regular meditation. Conclusion: This app is perfect for you if you want to bring more mindfulness into your life with meditation. It doesn't matter whether you've never meditated before or are an old hand at meditation. By the way: since version 4.0, we have even built in special modes for the masters of meditation: the Master Mode for up to 4 hours of meditation at a time and the Zen Mode, which sounds the end chime three times. With this in mind, I wish you: a peaceful mind and a calm disposition. Why use a meditation app at all? A meditation app offers a simple and accessible way to regularly integrate mindfulness and inner peace into your everyday life. It helps to reduce stress, promote concentration and increase general well-being. Especially in a hectic world where we are often overwhelmed by obligations and distractions, a meditation app helps to create moments of calm and to arrive in the here and now. There is an important connection between meditation apps and the concept of MBSR (Mindfulness-Based Stress Reduction), a scientifically based method for reducing stress. MBSR uses mindfulness exercises such as meditation, breathing techniques and body scans to manage stress and chronic strain. Many meditation apps are based on similar principles and offer guided exercises that integrate the central elements of MBSR. This allows users to benefit from the proven techniques and integrate mindfulness into their everyday lives - whether to manage stress, improve sleep or promote serenity. Translated with DeepL.com (free version)

name: Plum Village: Zen Meditation
description: Looking to touch peace, calm and ease in today’s frantic and often stressful world? The Plum Village practices are an invaluable support. Use mindfulness meditation techniques taught by a renowned Zen Buddhist Master to connect deeply with the present moment, soothe anxiety, experience more joy and happiness, and taste enlightenment. Explore a wealth of easy-to-use guided meditations, relaxations, and talks. The Plum Village app enables us to bring mindfulness into our life, so we can live each moment more deeply and create a happier future. As Zen Master Thich Nhat Hanh said, mindfulness allows us to be truly alive. ========================================== Plum Village: Zen Guided Meditation App – Main Features ========================================== • Free forever with no ads or in-app purchases • 100+ guided meditations • A customizable meditation timer • A “Mindfulness Bell” to incorporate into your daily routine • 300+ video sessions/Q&As with Thich Nhat Hanh and Plum Village teachers • 15 guided meditations for children • “Favourite” your most loved meditations to find them easily • Download talks and meditations to the app for easy offline practice • Track time spent listening to meditations as “Mindful Minutes” in the Apple Health app (if enabled) The Plum Village app is regularly being updated with new guided meditations and talks. It is completely free to download and all of the content is available for free. =========================================== Plum Village: Zen Guided Meditation App – Main Categories =========================================== The Plum Village app is split into four easy-to-use categories – meditations, talks, resources, and bells of mindfulness: MEDITATIONS Meditation is a deep practice that helps us generate peace and calm, master our mind, develop a healthy headspace, and get deep insights into ourselves and the world around us. Meditations include deep relaxations, guided contemplations, silent meditations, and eating meditations. Whether you have a little time or a lot, and whether you want to be on your cushion or applying mindfulness in your daily life, there are meditations to nourish, inspire, and incorporate into your daily routine. TALKS Listen and learn from the wisdom of Thich Nhat Hanh and other Plum Village meditation teachers Ask Thay includes hundreds of real-life questions asked to the Zen Master, like “How can we let go of anger? and “How can I stop worrying?” His answers are compassionate and infused with insight. Dharma Talks are teachings given by Thich Nhat Hanh and others on how to bring Buddhist wisdom and mindfulness into our life. Rather than discussing theoretical concepts, they focus on direct and clear teachings to relieve suffering and create happiness in our day to day lives. RESOURCES In Resources you can find a library of daily practices, chants, poems, and songs. These bring to life the practices taught in Plum Village monasteries around the world and offer ways to bring mindfulness into our world, wherever we are. BELL OF MINDFULNESS In Plum Village monasteries bells of mindfulness chime at regular intervals. Everybody stops and takes three mindful breaths to pause from their thinking or talking, breathe, and return to their bodies. The Bell of Mindfulness allows us to have the same reminder on our phone. We can customize the bell to chime at different time periods. Settings include: • Start time / End time • Chime intervals • Bell volume • Daily repeating schedule Regular use of the Bell of Mindfulness will cultivate more calm and relaxation in your life. ------------------------------------ Why not give the Plum Village app a try and see how you can benefit from it? The app is a digital companion on your mindfulness journey. Created as a gift to the world, this free app contains invaluable resources to guide you towards inner peace and freedom. Download today for free!

Over the course of 9 days, Apple helped us design the app to be easy to use, beautiful to look at, and more accessible to all - Our meditation experts keep things simple, modern and fun so you’ll be inspired to meditate daily - We keep it short, powerful and effective with videos ranging from 1 to 45 minutes - Meditation timer & ambient sounds for self-guided sessions - 7-Day Intro to Meditation to kickstart your practice - 30-Day Meditation Challenge to build a consistent practice you love - Stay motivated by setting meditation reminders, goals & track your profile stats - Learn to meditate with our course library and then grow and explore from there - Save all your favorite meditations in custom playlists - Gratitude journal to start and end your day positive - Fresh, new content added regularly - Great for adults & children - Compatible with Dynamic Text - Compatible with Siri Shortcuts to play the meditation of the day or night - Sync your meditation stats with Apple Health - Compatible with SharePlay during FaceTime calls *Children should consult a parent before creating an account. * * * * * * * * * * * * * * APPLE LOVES US AND WE LOVE APPLE! - 9 days spent at Apple Entrepreneur Camp at Apple Headquarters (2020) - App of the Day (2020) - New Apps We Love (2018) * * * * * * * * * * * * * * IN THE PRESS: Featured in The New York Times, Vogue, The Los Angeles Times, Elle, CBS, NBC, GMA, Today Show, Goop, Fast Company, Forbes and more. * * * * * * * * * * * * * * SCIENTIFICALLY PROVEN BENEFITS OF MEDITATION - Improves mood - Increases presence & awareness - Increases calm & happiness - Improves memory & focus - Improves sleep - Improves grades & test scores - Reduces depression - Reduces anxiety & stress - Reduces sensitivity to pain - Reduces blood pressure * * * * * * * * * * * * * * Privacy Policy: www.unplug.com/privacy-policy Terms of Use: www.unplug.com/terms-of-use

name: Sadhguru- Yoga & Meditation
description: Connect with Sadhguru and practice Isha Yoga on the official Sadhguru App! Discover Yoga for beginners and benefit from free Yoga and meditation practices that can help you overcome stress and anxiety, and establish lasting calm and joy, in just a few minutes a day. Sadhguru App is available in 12 languages – Russian, French, Spanish, German, Hindi, Telugu, Gujarati, Kannada, Marathi, Malayalam, Bengali and Tamil. Start your day with Sadhguru’s daily quotes, stay up to date with his latest articles, listen to his podcasts, and watch videos on a wide range of topics including spirituality, success, Yoga, meditation, relationships, health, fitness, and living a joyful and stress-free life. Sadhguru’s Guidance and Wisdom Start your day with Sadhguru – Quotes for your daily dose of insight and inspiration Daily Sadhguru Wisdom Videos – Short daily wisdom bites from Sadhguru to help you start your spiritual life Sadhguru Videos, Articles, and Podcasts – Latest videos and articles on a wide range of intriguing topics, and podcasts, so you can access Sadhguru’s wisdom wherever you are. Free Yoga Practices Yoga for Health – A simple way to activate the energy nodules in your joints and exercise your muscles, bringing ease to the whole system. Yoga for Immunity – Practices to help enhance your immunity and lung capacity Yoga for Success – A vertical spine corresponds to a leap in capability in evolution. This simple practice keeps the spine healthy and active, naturally leading to success. Yoga for Overall Wellbeing – Yoga Namaskar is a simple and powerful process that activates the lumbar region and strengthens the muscles along the spine to prevent the collapse of the spine due to ageing. Yoga for Peace – The Nadi Shuddhi practice cleanses the nadis, - the pathways through which pranic energy flows, - resulting in a balanced system and psychological well-being. Yoga for Joy – Nada Yoga - the Yoga of sound or reverberation, – allows you to utter the sounds that create an inner atmosphere of joy, making it a natural way to be. Yoga for Inner Exploration - Shambhavi Mudra is an easy, effortless process that enhances your perception and makes you receptive to that dimension of life often termed Grace. Yoga for Love – The many nerve endings in your palms make them very sensitive. By placing them together in Namaskar, you can change your chemistry to foster love within. Guided Meditations Isha Kriya – Learn a free 12-minute guided meditation designed by Sadhguru. Daily practice of Isha Kriya helps bring health, dynamism, peace and well-being. Sadhguru Presence – Experience Sadhguru's presence daily at 6:20 PM through a 7-minute guided chant. Infinity Meditation - Designed by Sadhguru, this 15-minute Infinity-guided meditation creates stability and balance in one’s energies and can bring one to an experience of boundlessness. Chants - Meditate to bliss chants Nirvana Shatakam and Gurupaduka stotram and carry the exuberance through the day. Chit Shakti Meditations – Using the power of the mind to create what one wants in one’s life is called Chit Shakti. Inner Engineering - Seven 90-minute sessions impart potent tools from the ancient science of Yoga, with the potential to transform how you live, conduct, and experience your life. Sadhguru Exclusive - Sadhguru Exclusive is a unique video platform to explore mysticism and spirituality with Sadhguru. It contains captivating glimpses of Sadhguru, revealing never-before-seen content deep within the Isha archives. Immerse yourself in many engaging series - each one featuring a unique selection of Sadhguru’s timeless wisdom. name: Petit BamBou: Mindfulness
description: If you would you like to: - Feel calm and peaceful at bedtime, - Feel more clear-headed and focused throughout the day, - Understand your emotions better and learn to take control of them, - Or if you are simply interested in discovering something new, You've come to the right place! Our mission? To help you nurture your mental health and your balance from within. Petit BamBou is a hugely popular meditation and breathing app in Europe, bringing together 10 million people seeking a more in-tune life (that means a lot to us!). But what is meditation with Petit BamBou? - It's a secular practice that's simple and accessible: all you have to do is give it a go. - Its benefits have been scientifically proven: it reduces stress and anxiety, increases concentration and creativity, and improves sleep quality. - It involves consciously focusing our attention on our present experience. What you'll find in the app: Included in the free version: - Introductory sessions for adults and children with the ""Discovery"" and ""Discovery for Kids"" programmes - 3 daily meditations of your choice - A selection of background music to help you relax, concentrate or fall asleep - Animated stories to help you understand the basic principles of mindfulness - Unlimited access to the free-breathing and meditation tool for your relaxation and heart coherence exercises - A caring and attentive customer service With absolutely no advertising and no need to enter your credit card information. If you want to take things further, our monthly or half-yearly subscription gives you access to: - A complete catalogue of meditation programmes (over 100 themes available) and new ones to come. - A daily meditation with a customisable time slot of 8, 12 or 16 minutes. - Access to the entire relaxing sound and ambience library, anywhere, anytime. - Unlimited access to the free-breathing and meditation tool. - Attentive and prompt customer service. - There is still no advertising, and you can cancel the automatic subscription renewal at any time at just a click. The difference between free and paid access is quantity, not quality. Petit BamBou also brings together a wide range of other practices, including sophrology, visualisation and positive psychology, so we hope you'll find what you're looking for. You can access all this with guidance from the leading experts in their field (psychologists, psychiatrists, meditation instructors). At Petit BamBou, we work from the heart, an app made by people for people - from our offices in Tourcoing. Nothing could be simpler, just give it a go! You can download it for free on all your devices (phones, tablets, and connected watches). Still have a query? You can write to us at help@petitbambou.com; we're here to help! Terms and Conditions : https://petitbambou.com/en/terms-of-service Privacy policy : https://petitbambou.com/en/privacy

description: ** #1 Meditation App and 100% FREE (no ads and no subscription)** ** Guided MEDITATION ** Whether you have 2 minutes or 2 hours in your day, Soothing Pod can fit into any schedule and is easy to use, no matter your experience with meditation. And with a new 10-minute meditation every day, there’s no shortage of mindfulness to melt your worries away. In our mission to make relaxation and mindfulness available to all, we also created meditations for kids as a way to introduce them to the practice of mindfulness. ** SLEEP STORIES ** Enjoy various soothing sleep stories from classic fairy tales like Cinderella, be whisked away to the Garden of Europe, or enjoy a story of a romantic getaway to a private island. With our vast library of sleep stories, the choice is yours. We also provide sleep stories created especially for kids, such as an adventure to the African safari, whale watching in California and many more. ** Relaxing Music & Sleep Sounds** From instrumental piano, guitar, smooth jazz, classical music and meditative tunes, our beautiful music is created to accompany you to sleep and help you relax NATURE SOUNDS Soothe your eyes as well as your ears with beautifully shot cinemagraphs and videos accompanying every soundscape. Escape to lush forests, flower fields, waterfalls, gentle streams and the most beautiful mountains and lakes. Enjoy hundreds of sounds that will let you escape, relax and lull you to sleep. SPECIAL FEATURES - Toggle easily between Adult and Kids mode to help your young ones drift off to sleep. - Customize each meditation and sleep story -- choose between male and female narrators and adjust the volume of music and sound effects according to your preference. - Sleep timer -- you can set a sleep timer so our relaxing scenes will continue playing to accompany you to sleep. When the timer ends, the scene will gently fade out. Read the terms and conditions here: http://www.miinu.com/tos.php Read the privacy policy here: http://www.miinu.com/privacy.php We hope you enjoy resting and relaxing with Soothing Pod. With gratitude, The Soothing Pod Team
