description: Embark on a journey to wellness with Glo. Glo isn't just an app; it's your gateway to feeling more connected and centered-whether you're at home or on the move. Our mission is to bring the best yoga, meditation, Pilates, and fitness classes directly to you, led by the world's top instructors. Tailored to fit your life, Glo supports you from the moment you roll out your mat to the final savasana. Why Choose Glo? Unparalleled Class Variety: With Glo, experience the richness of yoga, Pilates, meditation, and fitness classes designed to meet you at every level of practice. From soothing meditation to energizing yoga flows and strength-building Pilates, every class is an opportunity to nurture your body and mind. Live Classes & A Personalized Library: Join live classes to feel the collective energy of real-time practice or dive into our extensive on-demand library to fit wellness into your schedule. Glo's personalization features let you curate your own wellness path, saving your favorite classes and tracking your journey. World-Class Instruction Anywhere: Learn from globally recognized teachers who provide compassionate instruction and support. Whether you're seeking to start a meditation habit, explore Pilates, or deepen your yoga practice, our instructors are here to guide you. Flexible Practice for Every Stage: Glo adapts to your life. Start with beginner fundamentals, challenge yourself with advanced sequences, or find comfort in prenatal and postnatal offerings. Wherever you are in your wellness journey, Glo has a class for you. Accessible Anytime, Anywhere: With the ability to download classes, Glo ensures your practice is always within reach. Transform any space into your personal studio- from a quiet room at home to a serene outdoor setting. Join the Glo Community Glo is more than an app; it's a community. Beyond the mat, you'll find a supportive network of like-minded individuals all working towards personal growth and wellness. With Glo, every day is a chance to connect more deeply with yourself and your practice.

You can just focus on meditation without thinking about the time. Meditation is a classic, simple and inexpensive way to lead you into wonderful state of inner peace and inner calm, and it helps to keep you relax from anxious, tense, worried etc and also stress reduction, meditation enhance your physical, mental and emotional wellbeing. With Meditation Timer, you can practice meditation anywhere and anytime. Key Features: ⁃ One Default meditation schedule and you can edit it. ⁃ With prepare time, interval time and cool down time. ⁃ Set unique sound for beginning, interval switching, ending and cool down end. ⁃ Sounds play one, two or three times. ⁃ Ten amazing background pictures, shake to change. ⁃ Start, stop, restart or resume meditation. ⁃ Hide the time. ⁃ Create unlimited reminders to remind you practicing meditation. ⁃ Passwords protection. ⁃ Vibrate or not when switching sections. ⁃ With or without sound. ⁃ Support iPod media background. ⁃ Supports Today Widget. ⁃ Supports transferring data to Health app. ⁃ Supports universal version. name: The Way - Guided Meditation
description: THE WAY is a new kind of meditation app: a single path, led by an authorized Zen master, that guides you on a deep meditation training program. Study alongside Zen master Henry Shukman as you uncover the deep peace, love, insight and awakening that meditation can bring. The simple path to deeper meditation. With THE WAY, you will: *** Never feel overwhelmed by choice. The Way guides you step-by-step along a single, linear path through all the key areas of a deep and fulfilling meditation practice. You never have to worry about which meditation to choose. *** Experience real transformation and deep wellbeing. Progress along a proven pathway of meditation that helps you to awaken to the true nature of your mind, your self, and your relationship to the world. Explore Zen koans, non-dual awareness and other awakening techniques. *** Benefit from an authorized Zen Master as your guide. Study with a beloved teacher with over 35 years of meditation practice. Learn Henry Shukman’s innovative fusion of modern mindfulness, Jhana practice and Sanbo Zen teaching. HENRY SHUKMAN teaches mindfulness and awakening practices to a wide range of students from all traditions and walks of life. Henry is an authorized Zen Master in the Sanbo Zen lineage, and is the Spiritual Director of Mountain Cloud Zen Center in Santa Fe, New Mexico. His struggles and traumatic experiences as a youth, combined with a spontaneous awakening experience at 19, paved the way for Henry to develop a well-rounded approach to meditation. On the journey of THE WAY, you can learn to: *** Calm the nervous system, reduce stress on a daily basis and release trauma over time *** Uncover previously unknown support and gratitude in our lives *** Access beautiful states of flow and absorption during meditation *** Get tastes and glimpses of awakening - insights into your own true nature, and discovering what non-duality really means, and the deep freedom and joy it can give. THE WAY works through a series of daily guided meditations and talks along a single path of practice. Through these guided meditations you will explore with Zen Master Henry Shukman: teaching from ancient Buddhist traditions, finding peace and unconditional wellbeing in the heart of our lives, learning how to sit with and process negative emotions, healing from past traumas, uncovering deep joy in the bare fact of being alive, discovering a deep and connected presence, understanding insights into non-duality and awakening to the true nature of reality. All grounded in modern mindfulness and ancient Zen wisdom. SUBSCRIPTION AND SCHOLARSHIPS THE WAY is free to download and try out the pathway. You can manage your subscription from your Apple account settings. Payment will be charged to your Apple account. If you can’t afford the cost of the subscription, please let us know and we will arrange a free subscription to THE WAY for you through our scholarship program. name: Brightmind Meditation
description: **New Apps We Love** -- Apple "The only meditation app I’ve stuck with, all others don’t even come close to this level of coaching and clarity." As Simple As Possible, But No Simpler Brightmind’s motto is, “make it as simple as possible, but no simpler”. So Brightmind takes deep and transformative practices and explains them in practical ways. Making things as simple as possible—but not any simpler—leads to efficient and effective learning and growth. Your One-Stop-Shop In addition to daily award-winning guided meditations, Brightmind offers everything you need to maintain a life-changing practice. Community Chat Ask questions and share your experiences of practice with Brightminders from all over the world. Offer and receive support for any behavior change goal (diet, exercise, substances, etc.) in our Accountability & Support Groups. Daily Sits Meditating with friends is ten times easier and more fun than meditating alone. Join any of our four daily community sits! I (Toby) usually join the 12pm, ET sit : ) 1-on-1 Coaching Confused about something you learned in the guided meditations? Not sure what to do when this or that happens during your meditation practice? I got you. I (Toby) make sure to set aside time in my schedule for one-on-one sessions. By offering information, accountability, emotional support, and inspiration, I’ll help you overcome challenges and take advantage of opportunities in your meditation practice. Retreats Retreats—more so than daily practice—change the way your mind works. Retreats really move the needle. They’re also a great way to connect with Brightmind’s global community of dedicated practitioners. We gather for four hours on the fourth Saturday of every month. About Us Toby Sola Toby Sola is dedicated to helping you create a feedback loop between your meditation practice and your ability to make the world a better place. So the more you meditate, the more effective you are in the world. And the more effective you are, the deeper your meditation practice becomes. Toby has been teaching meditation for two decades. His craft as a teacher has been refined through years of monastic training and close collaboration with the world-renowned teacher Shinzen Young. Toby is an award-winning designer and the founder of Brightmind. Shinzen Young Shinzen Young trained for a decade in monasteries in Asia, and has been teaching in the West for over 50 years. As the Co-director of the SEMA lab, he’s now at the forefront of contemplative neuroscience. So Shinzen is unique in that he brings together an authentic and deep understanding of meditation with the rigor and precision of modern science. Shinzen likes to say of himself: “I’m a Jewish-American Buddhist teacher who got turned on to comparative mysticism by an Irish-Catholic priest and who has developed a Burmese-Japanese fusion practice inspired by the spirit of quantified science.” : ) --- You'll have the option to save your meditation sessions as Mindful Minutes in your Apple Health App. SUBSCRIPTION PRICING AND TERMS Brightmind offers one auto-renewing subscription: $99.99 per year This price is for US customers, and pricing in other countries may vary. The actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on your country of residence. name: Core Meditation
description: Core helps you build your inner strength with the most immersive meditation experience out there. This is meditation you can feel, guided by dynamic vibrations, audio and lighting. Connect your Core Meditation Trainer with the app, drop in, and go. Together with the Trainer, the Core app will track your personal progress using stress-level measurements and other biometric data insights. DIVE INTO OUR MEDITATION LIBRARY - Learn new Breath Training techniques, then practice them on your own with Core's guiding vibrations. - Unwind with longer guided classes, or jump into a short 3-minute session — whatever fits your schedule. - Meditations guided by our expert instructors cover a variety of topics, geared towards all experience levels. - Pick a vibration pattern, choose a duration, and drop into one of Core's original ambient and musical soundscapes. Your Core Meditation Trainer pulses alongside your sessions. Depending on the type of meditation, the vibrations will guide you in learning Breath Training techniques, or serve as a gentle reminder to help focus your attention and anchor you in the present. MEASURE YOUR PROGRESS No more wondering whether meditation is actually working for you or not. With the Core Meditation Trainer connected to your app, you can see how meditation is directly affecting your body through several different metrics: - Training - Track your consistency over time. Making meditation a part of your regular routine helps train your brain to respond to it, and unlocks numerous health benefits. - Calm - Calm is represented by the dominance of your parasympathetic nervous system. We measure this based on your heart rate and its variability over time (HRV). With practice, you can train yourself to reach a Calm state more quickly. - Focus - Some techniques get you energized, priming your mind and activating your senses into a highly responsive state. Core measures how much time you spend in a Focused state by the pattern of your heart rhythm. After each meditation, Core will show you how Calm and Focused you were. Long-term historical graphs lets you see how your resilience to stress is changing over time, and track your progress with daily streaks. Core will also integrate with Apple HealthKit to share Mindful Minutes and read data to improve the accuracy of your biometric insights. DEEPEN YOUR PRACTICE WITH CORE PREMIUM Go Premium to access our always-growing library of on-demand meditation classes. New sessions are added daily by our team of expert instructors, so you never get bored. Follow along with your favorite instructors to stay inspired and centered. All new users automatically receive a free 2-week trial of our premium content. After that, Core offers two auto-renewing subscription plans: $9.99 per month $69.99 for one year (that's less than $6 a month) The subscription will automatically renew unless turned off in your iTunes Account Settings at least 24 hours before the current period ends. name: VipassanaMeditation VRI
description: Vipassana Research Institute (VRI), a non-profit-making body, was established in 1985 with the principal aim of conducting scientific research into the sources and applications of the Vipassana Meditation Technique. It is a technique of observation and exploration of the mind-body phenomena. The technique leads to purification of mind and can bring about a major transformation in the attitude and behavioural pattern of an individual and, through him, in the entire society. It has a unique potential as an instrument for better education, health, organisation, management development and social change for strengthening the concept of secularism, national integration and international understanding. From time to time, we all experience agitation, frustration and disharmony. When we suffer, we do not keep our misery limited to ourselves; instead, we keep distributing it to others. Certainly this is not a proper way to live. We all want to live peacefully within ourselves, and with those around us. After all, human beings are social beings: we have to live and interact with others. How, then, can we live peacefully? How, then, can we remain harmonious ourselves, and maintain peace and harmony around us? Vipassana enables us to experience peace and harmony by purifying the mind, freeing it from suffering and the deep-seated causes of suffering. Step by step, the practice leads to the highest spiritual goal of full liberation from all mental defilements. Vipassana has been revived after a period of more than 2500 years. Courses of Vipassana meditation started in India since 1969, however, initially, there was no separate institution to explore the theory part of the technique. The importance of establishing such an Institute was realized when Mr. S. N. Goenka, principal teacher of Vipassana meditation, began teaching courses on the Satipatthāna Sutta, a discourse in which the Buddha systematically explains the technique of Vipassana. During the Satipatthāna courses, Goenkaji noticed students studying the words of the Buddha (pariyatti), were encouraged and filled with gratitude when applying them in their meditation practice (patipatti). They found their understanding and practice strengthened, owing to their experiential understanding of the Buddha’s words. Naturally, some of them felt inspired to undertake further study, and to provide this opportunity, the Vipassana Research Institute was established. For decades now, the words of Goenkaji have inspired masses to not only get introduced to the technique but also to go deeper in their meditative practice. This app aims to make Vipassana Meditation instructions and media available globally to all so that all benefit from this wonderful technique.

name: Declutter The Mind Meditation
description: Declutter The Mind offers guided meditation for mindfulness, sleep, anxiety, stress, work, and a lot more. In addition, Declutter The Mind offers 30-day courses that will teach you how to meditate, form the habit of a regular practice, and expand your mind through the teachings of mindfulness meditation. This is all without positioning meditation as something mystical, spiritual, or supernatural for it to work for you. The science already shows that a regular meditation practice improves mental health and happiness. Let our app help you unlock these benefits without attaching it to something woo-woo. Declutter The Mind offers a practical and easy approach to sitting down and observing the mind. With enough practice, you’ll start to have insights into your mind, how it works, and how busy it is. These insights can make you a calmer, less reactive, and happier person. WHAT IS MEDITATION If you want to understand the mind, sit down and observe it. Meditation is using a non-judgemental awareness to notice what thoughts, feelings, and sensations appear in consciousness. It’s about becoming aware of just how busy the mind is, and breaking away from that momentum. Buddhists call this the monkey mind, the mind that’s constantly busy and chattering, sometimes without us even fully noticing it. We can call this clutter, and this app will help you declutter the mind. HOW IT WORKS Meditation doesn’t require any special equipment, or crossing your legs in a particular way, or holding your fingers out. You just need a comfortable and quiet spot where you can remain undisturbed for 10 minutes. Once you’ve found your spot, choose the guided meditation that best suits your needs. If you’re unsure where to start, check out the Essentials category to find meditations for beginners. Choose the session, select your length, and follow the guided instructions. WHAT’S IN THE APP - Several categories of individual guided meditations - Courses for new practitioners and experienced meditators - A new guided meditation every single day with the Daily Guided Meditation feature - 30-day mindfulness course for beginners - 10-day loving-kindness course - Theory included in each lesson, along with a guided practice - Emergency category allowing you quick sessions in times of need - Heart your favorites so they’re easy to find and return to later - Set a daily reminder to meditate at the time you want with the built-in Push Notification Reminders - Meditation timer for unguided meditation - Dark mode and light mode - Download play offline - Different types of meditation: Mindfulness, Vipassana, Loving-Kindness, visualization, body scan - Meditation and mindfulness articles to deepen your leaning - Guided meditation led by a 15+ year practitioner TOPICS INCLUDE - Mindfulness - Body scan - Loving-kindness - Breathing exercises - Anxiety - Stress - PTSD - Depression - Sleep - Relaxation - Focus - Concentration and clarity - Morning and waking up - Energy - Cravings - Anger - Mental health - Managing emotions UPCOMING FEATURES - Live guided meditations - Track your minutes and time meditating using Mindful Minutes and Apple Health - Track stats: total minutes meditated, number of days total meditated - Selectable meditation length - Group meditation sessions with friends and family - Friends list - Apple Watch integration All guided meditations are free for life. Besides the guided meditations, the app includes meditation courses, which you can try the first 5 days for free. If you’d like to continue the courses, you can subscribe for $7.99 USD a month or $79.99 USD a year. Need help? Visit help.declutterthemind.com for support, and head on over to declutterthemind.com for more information and free guided meditations you can try on our website. Terms of use: https://declutterthemind.com/terms-of-service/ Privacy policy: https://declutterthemind.com/privacy-policy/

name: Envol - Meditation & Wellness

Envol also offers breathing exercises to help you manage your stress levels and improve your physical health. Our breathing exercises are designed to promote deep relaxation and reduce tension in your body, so you can feel more energized and focused. We understand that weight loss can be a significant challenge for many people, which is why Envol offers tools and resources to help you love the body you’re in on your journey towards self-love. Envol also offers tools for focus and concentration, including visualization exercises and techniques to improve your cognitive function. These tools can help you stay focused and productive, even when you're under pressure. At Envol, we believe in the power of community support. Our app is designed to empower you to achieve your wellness goals on your own terms. We provide you with the resources and tools you need to feel less alone and more supported in your wellness journey. Burnout and pain relief are also themes that Envol addresses. Our app provides guided meditations and tools to help you manage burnout levels and relieve pain. We understand the importance of self-care and self-love, which is why Envol offers resources and guided meditations to help you develop a positive relationship with yourself and achieve emotional balance. Envol is a comprehensive wellness app that provides you with the resources and tools you need to achieve your wellness goals. Our app offers guided meditations, sound journeys, visualization music, frequencies, affirmations, breathing exercises, tools for weight loss, focus, concentration, burnout and pain relief, and self-love and self-care. Envol also includes a self-care tracker to help you stay on top of your well-being goals. Our tracker helps you recharge your body by including activities such as connecting with nature (grounding), movement, sunshine, healthy food, sleep, gratitude, and mental rest. You can easily log your activities and track your progress, so you can see how far you've come on your wellness journey. The self-care tracker is a great way to stay accountable to yourself and ensure that you're taking the necessary steps to live a healthy, balanced life. Envol is more than just an app - it's a way of life. Our app is designed to help you navigate the world of wellness living and discover the tools and resources you need to live your best life. Join Envol today and start your journey towards a healthier, happier life. description: Learn meditation. Meditating with Namatata helps to improve sleep, relaxation and confidence. If you choose to continue your meditation experience, you have access to meditation techniques depending on what you are doing, express sessions, or you can choose to meditate in silence through the classic sessions. In the world, mindfulness meditation is booming thanks to Deepak Choprah, Oprah Winfrey and Jon Kabat-Zinn. Inspired by the MBSR and MBCT program, the power of the present moment makes it possible to manage : - stress reduction, - anxiety, - burn out, - social phobia, social anxiety - depression. The flow of thoughts (emotions, memories, etc...) flows continuously in our mind. We always think about what we have to do, what we have to remember,... By dint of being in the future or the past, we forget the present moment. Taking time for oneself, setting up a relaxation routine to reduce stress, being positive and Zen are important factors for even more effective well-being and personal development. These exercises, some of which are taken from sophro (sophrology), will help you sleep or help you be positive. Antoine's sweet voice will plunge you into the silence of meditation. Preksha Meditation helps you to find peace inside, reduce stress, sleep well, get calm and good health.

name: Moments of Space Meditation
description: Step into a powerful, eyes-open meditation experience with Moments of Space. TRANSFORM YOUR WAY OF BEING WITH A GUIDED PATH Our Path meditations guide you seamlessly through the realms of Body, Mind, Heart and Space, with the choice to practise in Stationary or Walking Mode, encouraging practice any time, any place. TAKE IT STEP BY STEP Within the Paths in Learn, you’ll be guided through the teachings, techniques, and a meditation. In Practice, you’ll hone that technique as you meditate with more space and less guidance and in Apply, you'll receive practical guidance on how to integrate these techniques into daily life. PRACTISE ANY TIME, ANY PLACE WITH EYES-OPEN MEDITATION Our innovative open-eyes guidance blends meditation with daily life. Stay present and awake, making every moment an opportunity for mindfulness. PERSONALISE YOUR JOURNEY Use our Daily Reflect feature to check in with how you’re feeling in one or more areas of your being. We’ll then tailor your progression through the Paths and you’ll receive Moments recommendations based on your reflections, along with a thought-provoking quote to encourage deeper self-exploration. MEDITATIONS FOR ALL MOMENTS Our comprehensive Moments bank offers stand-alone meditations from 4 to 30 minutes, catering to your unique needs. From sessions for sleep, anxiety, and stress, to those that deepen your awakening experience, we've got you covered. SHORT AND SWEET When you’re in a rush and literally only have a moment to meditate, you can find a selection of eyes-open Short meditations on your Home screen. These practices aim to give you a glimpse of the awakened mindset you’re travelling towards, motivating you to to come back and continue the Path journey when you’ve got a little more time on your hands. EVERYTHING YOU NEED IN ONE PLACE Head to your Home Tab to check in with your guide, Alisha, and find everything you need for your daily practice. Here you can see where you’re up to on your Path and dive back in, explore the Moments recommended for you each day, or access a selection of eyes-open Short meditations for a quick awakening practice. STAY MOTIVATED AND EARN REWARDS Journey with us and track your progress. Our challenge meter keeps you motivated, offering badges from Bronze to Gold and beyond. Share your progress, inspire others, and never worry about missing a day. EMBRACE ACCOUNTABILITY WITH FRIENDS Buddy Up to stay accountable. Invite friends to connect, compare progress, and motivate each other. See how your habit compares to the wider Moments of Space community each month. DEVELOP INDEPENDENT PRACTICE Use our meditation Timer to practise the skills you’ve learned without guidance. Try ambient soundscapes and bells to enrich your experience. SYNC WITH APPLE HEALTH Integrate with HealthKit to add your meditation minutes to your Apple Health app, tracking your mindful minutes effortlessly. JOIN OUR COMMUNITY Become part of a co-creation journey with Moments of Space. Our community-powered platform rewards your contribution and helps shape our collective future. Download the app and check our FAQ for details on how to join us ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- The subscription will automatically renew unless turned off in your Apple Account settings under “Subscriptions” at least 24 hours before the current period ends. You can go to your Apple Account settings to manage your subscription and turn off auto-renew. Your Apple Account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed. Read our terms and conditions here: https://www.momentsofspace.com/terms-and-conditions Read our privacy policy here: https://www.momentsofspace.com/privacy-policy Read Apple’s terms of use here: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
